characters: REY FIRES BACK AS BLASTS HIT AROUND HER. FINN WRAPS AN AR
AGAIN AND AGAIN AND HITS KYLO REN SQUARE IN THE HEAD AND
CHEST. HE GOES DOWN, SUDDENLY A FEARFUL MAN, A LARGE BURN
LUKE'S LIGHTSABER FLIES FROM FINN'S HAND, THROWN TWENTY F
THE GUAVIAN DEATH GANG, GRABBING TWO MEMBERS
ELSE, AND THE ENTIRE PLANET OF HOSNIAN PRIME IS INCINERAT
PERPENDICULAR SMALLER BLADES AT THE HILT, A UNIQUE BUZZ -
LASER SIPHON SHOOTING INTO THE SKY, SLOWLY SUCKING THE SU
AROUND HER AND DRAGS/CARRIES HER OUT OF SIGHT
ENGINE OF A DECAYING, CRASHED STAR DESTROYER
HEXAGONAL OSCILLATOR STRUCTURE IN THE DISTANCE
THE FALCON ENGINES LIGHT UP BRIGHT
ILLUMINATE REY, WHOSE FACE FILLS WITH HOPE
BASE IS DRAWN INTO A LARGER IMAGE, REVEALING THE ENTIRE B
REY, WHO STANDS, FACING HIM, HAVING REACHED FOR IT HERSEL
IN ANOTHER CORRIDOR, BACK WITH THE GANGS
OUT, RIGHT THROUGH HAN'S CHEST AND BACK
LARGE NAVIGATIONAL MAP WITH A SPECIFIC MISSING CHUNK
LIGHTS RISE FROM THE NEWLY-FORMED CANYON
PUSH IN ON HAN, HOPE SURGING
THE WINDOWS ARE BLOWN IN BY LASER BLASTS
OF ENERGY STRAINING AND VIBRATING IN MID AIR
IN THE LOUNGE, CHEWIE IS IN PAIN --
SNOWY, ROCKY GROUND, HEADED FOR A THICK FOREST
FROM HIS BODY AND SHOCKS FINN
SPINNING IT, JAMMING IT INTO FORWARD POSITION
LIKE A HUGE MOUTH WHICH SWALLOWS THE FALCON LIKE A WHALE
THE WINDOW TO REVEAL A STARKILLER TECHNICIAN
YELLOW/RED ENERGY, SPITTING SPARKS AND SMOKE --
FIRST WE SEE OF A MASSIVE FREIGHTER, ITS GIANT HANGAR OPE
ARMS AROUND PHASMA, FORCED TO FACE FINN, WHO HOLDS HIS BL
KYLO REN TURNS TO SEE LUKE'S LIGHTSABER LAND IN THE HAND
SILENT, AN IMPOSSIBLE BLAST OF FIRE LIGHT
FINALLY FLIES OUT OF THE SNOW, BULLETS TOWARD KYLO REN --
THE FOUR HEROES TURN TO EACH OTHER, RESOLVE IN THEIR EYES
ORDER TROOPS, REFLECTED IN THE STILL LAKE.
BUT UTTERLY STUNNED THAT IT LANDED IN HER HAND
WINGS AND RESISTANCE SPACECRAFT APPEAR, BEGIN FIRING AT T
DIVE BOMBING THE OSCILLATOR, HITTING IT DEAD CENTER IN QU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TWENTY STORMTROOPERS. Holding on at attention, moving to the ship's rhythm, in the tense moments before a raid. A FILTERED COMMAND and they LOCK AND LOAD their heavy blast rifles. The BRUTAL NOISE is replaced by SUDDEN, SHOCKING

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT of a small, peaceful village. Distant sounds of native animals. A single wind chime. Suddenly a DROID RISES INTO FRAME, CLOSE: ROUND and SKITT orange and white, this is BB-8. Focuses on something past camera. He BEEPS -- FAST, MORSE CODE-LIKE SOUNDS, clearly worried. Moves EVEN CLOSER TO CAMERA -- is MORE worried -- BEEPS more -- then TURNS AND

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON A HAND: a small LEATHER SACK is placed in the pa The hand closes. Another OLDER HAND covers it. In a primitive HUT, an old explorer, LOR SAN TEKKA, (rugg kind) has handed the mysterious sack to POE DAMERON (32, a pilot's jacket). Poe has charisma, a natural spark:

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: This will begin to make things right. I've traveled too far, and seen too much, to ignore the despair in the galaxy. Without the Jedi, there can be no balance in the Force.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, because of you now we have a chance. The General's been after this for a long time.

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: "The General." To me, she's royalty. Well, she certainly is that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 ENTERS FRANTIC, BEEPS. Concerned, Poe turns to Lor S Tekka.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got company.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men exit fast. Poe moves TO CAMERA, raises QUADNOCULA POE'S POV: LIGHTS on the horizon -- approaching ENEMY SHI POE lowers the quadnocs -- PUSH IN ON HIS UNNERVED EYES. GROWING, FRIGHTENING THUNDER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to hide.

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: You have to leave. Go! Poe turns to him. Conflicted. Finally nods, hurries off. BB-8 follows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRACK FAST with Poe as he and BB-8 hurry through the vill various ARMED VILLAGERS taking position, prepared to defe

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A ROAR of WIND and DUST: the TRANSPORTS LAND. Stormtroope come out FIRING BLASTERS -- the VILLAGERS FIRE BACK -- ma are HIT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe runs to an X-WING fighter, parked at a distance from village, hidden behind a ROCK OUTCROPPING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, BB-8! Hurry! Poe sends BB-8 into the droid socket / co-pilot seat -- h moves to the cockpit -- the CONTROLS COME TO LIFE. As the CANOPY CLOSES, Poe shoots a quick look back: the ENEMY AR IN THE DISTANCE. Poe urgently works the controls -- BB-8 BEEPS. The X-WING LANDING LIGHTS COME ON, ENGINES WHINE TO LIFE! But just then: Poe's ship is suddenly HIT BY BLASTERFIRE! Poe turns to look: two STORMTROOPERS CHARGE HIS WAY, FIRING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I see 'em! BB-8 BEEPS nervously as Poe GRABS HIS CONTROLS and FIRES THEM, using the X-wing's drop-down antipersonnel blaster! The two Troopers are BLOWN AWAY in the large BLAST HITS! Poe tries to start the ship now, but the ENGINES SPUTTER. Concerned, he opens his canopy, jumps down, moves to the back of his ship: BAD DAMAGE ON THE REAR ENGINE PANEL. They're in trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lor San Tekka moves sadly through the village as STORMTRO wielding FLAME THROWERS destroy structures. Surrendering Villagers are ROUNDED UP. Penned ANIMALS panic.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back at the X-wing, Poe kneels beneath his ship, pulls fr the leather sack a SMALL, OLD ARTIFACT which he inserts i BB-8 -- the droid's MULTI-READER ENVELOPS it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You take this. It's safer with you than it is with me. You get as far away from here as you can. Do you hear me? (BB-8 BEEPS, hesitates) I'll come back for you! It will be alright.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 watches Poe run off. BEEP-WHINES nervously, then tur and heads off. Turns back once to look at Poe, then ROLLS AWAY. Poe uses his blaster rifle to fire at incoming troo from cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Troopers and villagers in battle -- as one Trooper is HIT and goes down. Another -- OUR TROOPER -- KNEELS to he The hit trooper raises a torn, bloody glove -- his HUMAN HAND visible -- and MARKS OUR STORMTROOPER'S MASK WITH BL just before he dies. Our Trooper, stands -- overwhelmed b the battle.

dialogues.speaker: LANDS NEAR THE TRANSPORT VEHICLES.
dialogues.text: The shuttle craft door OPENS -- through the wind and smok KYLO REN exits the ship: a TALL, DARK FIGURE, he strides through the chaos toward San Tekka. A senior Trooper moves to our blood-marked Trooper, and o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay here. Our Trooper nods. Kylo Ren stops before the outraged Lor San Tekka, dwarfin him. Only now does it become apparent that Kylo Ren wears DARK MASK, marked by battle. Inset metal lines reflect FI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look how old you've become.

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: Something far worse has happened to you. Our blood-marked TROOPER is placed in line with other stormtroopers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what I've come for.

dialogues.speaker: CONTINUED
dialogues.text: I know where you come from. Before you called yourself Kylo Ren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The map to Skywalker. We know you've found it, and now you're going to give it to the First Order. Adjacent to the village, Poe enters frame -- sees the Ren Tekka exchange continue.

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: The First Order rose from the dark side... you did not.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll show you the dark side.

dialogues.speaker: LOR SAN TEKKA
dialogues.text: You may try, but you cannot deny the truth that is your family. Suddenly Kylo Ren raises his LIGHTSABER -- IGNITES IT --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're so right. And as he RIPS IT DOWN ACROSS SAN TEKKA! Poe, RUNNING, SEES THIS AND YELLS, AIMS HIS BLASTER AND F AT KYLO REN! Instantly: Kylo Ren RAISES HIS HAND -- POE'S BLAST FREEZES -- THE BO

dialogues.speaker: OF ENERGY STRAINING AND VIBRATING IN MID AIR
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren sees Poe, who suddenly CANNOT MOVE, but strains He is grabbed by Stormtroopers who drag him past the VIBRATING, FROZEN BLAST, to Kylo Ren. A Stormtrooper begins a brutal PAT DOWN. Kylo Ren moves closer. Poe just glares. The Stormtrooper KICKS OUT Poe's legs -- he lands hard on his knees. Kylo Ren kneels to look at Poe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So who talks first? You talk first?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The old man gave it to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just very hard to understand you with all the...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Search him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Apparatus. The Troopers roughly pull Poe away. A Stormtrooper begins brutal PAT DOWN. Kylo Ren moves closer. Poe just glares as the pat down ends.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put him on board. Kylo Ren regards the Stormtroopers with the rounded up Villagers, then turns to the CHROME-SKINNED, FEMALE BLACK CAPED HEAD STORMTROOPER, CAPTAIN PHASMA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the villagers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill them all. Phasma nods, steps forward:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On my command! The Troopers, including OURS, aim at the Villagers.

dialogues.speaker: CAPTAIN PHASMA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Fire! Poe is roughly PULLED into a transport ship, the ramp LIF All around our Trooper BLASTERFIRE ERUPTS -- but we're WI ENOUGH to see he ISN'T FIRING. PUSH IN until the FIRING STOPS. All the Stormtroopers SPREAD OUT TO SEARCH -- exce ours. Kylo Ren heads back toward his ship. But then he STOPS. Feels something. TURNS AND LOOKS AT OUR STORMTROOPER for LONG MOMENT. Our Trooper can barely meet his gaze; knows he's doomed. Kylo Ren then heads off -- passes the FROZEN BLAST, which after a beat, GOES FREE AND SLAMS INTO A NEARBY STRUCTURE scaring the hell out of our Stormtrooper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Stormtrooper climbs down from the cockpit of Poe's X-wi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nothing here. Go ahead! Three other Stormtroopers FIRE LASER CANNONS at the X-win destroying the ship in a LARGE EXPLOSION.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 rolls across the sand, looks back: the X-wing FIREBA BB-8, afraid, continues on his own in a mysterious, dark desert. We see a FORM -- an animal, its RED EYES LIFTING from the sand, watching the rolling droid, who just keeps going. In a WIDE SHOT, we HEAR HIM BEEPING to himself, lonely an frightened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With the SANDY PLANET OF JAKKU as backdrop, Troop Transpo and Kylo Ren's Shuttle approach a massive STAR DESTROYER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe, shackled, is ushered from the transport through the hangar. He is awed by the imposing space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right. All right! Our Stormtrooper passes, moves fast:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our Stormtrooper enters the dark, vehicle. He removes his helmet. His head comes up and we PUSH IN ON HIS FACE FOR THE FIRST TIME. This is FN-2187. He is 23, likable. But in this moment, terrified, desperate. After a beat, behind him, CAPTAIN PHASMA enters. FN-2187 knows he's in trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187. Submit your blaster for inspection.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And who gave you permission to remove that helmet?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Captain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Report to my division at once.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Phasma heads off. Shattered, FN-2187 replaces his helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A metal sheet is pulled open to reveal the wrapped up fac of A SCAVENGER, perhaps alien, in GOGGLES, FACE MASK and GLOVES. Backpack with a STAFF strapped to it. Uses TOOLS to remove various MECHANISMS from inside the wall. We are in an upside-down, canted CORRIDOR. The Scavenger finds a valuable piece, drops it in a SATCHEL. Swings the bag back and begins CLIMBING DOWN on a cable, between treacherous WALLS OF MACHINERY, headed to:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alone and tiny in this massive, sideways wreck, the Scave descends, climbing down a two-hundred foot-long cable. LA HARD onto rusty metal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scavenger carries the satchel and another large, foun piece, over enormous pipes in the vast space, heads throu the dust toward a distant SLIT OF SUNLIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Scavenger arrives from the darkness and pulls off gog and gear, revealing the grimy face of a beautiful, young WOMAN. This is REY, 19. She opens her canteen, shakes out the two final drops int her mouth. HITS THE SIDE of the canteen again and again f whatever she can get. CUT WIDE: Rey is rendered minuscule, standing at the bottom of an E

dialogues.speaker: ENGINE OF A DECAYING, CRASHED STAR DESTROYER
dialogues.text: of her canteen-hitting. She sets her things on a piece of sheet metal and sits next to it, sliding down the sand du She RIDES DOWN THE MOUNTAIN OF SAND. WE HOLD FOR A LONG TIME, looking down, as she recedes from us, toward the di SALT FLATS below. Random SCATTERED DEBRIS. Her SPEEDER, tiny from here. Rey moves to her junker SPEEDER, jumps on, fires the sput engine and DRIVES OFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey races along the desert floor: a GRAVEYARD OF CRASHED SPACESHIPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey's speeder PASSES us, heading for a dusty, desert town Refueling, small trade, scavengers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CRASH! Rey's sack carrying her heavy FOUND OBJECTS hits t sand. Working like a tough seaman, Rey hauls the sack fro her speeder toward the town.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON REY'S HANDS as she SCRUBS CLEAN her day's salvag Rey glances up: she looks at an old woman, also cleaning some salvage. Rey watches her, gets lost in the simple moment. A small, passing alien UNDERLING barks something to her in another language. She returns to work.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey looks up to a SERVICE WINDOW: two feet above her, beh a protective screen, is her boss, UNKAR PLUTT (50, blobfi unclean). He examines her pieces. Then he offers:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you've brought me today is worth... Hmmm... One quarter portion. Though disappointed, Rey barely shows it. She nods thanks Unkar pushes through his transfer drawer a SEALED PACKET: DRIED GREEN MEAT in one section, BEIGE POWDER in another. She takes it. She swallows her resentment and heads off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The IMMENSE SETTING SUN against the FLAT TERRAIN. Rey's SPEEDER races, almost insignificant, across frame.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She SCRATCHES MARKS into the rusty wall. Another MARK; another DAY. And there are THOUSANDS of marks. A SIZZLING SOUND over: A DRIED DESERT FLOWER in a rusty E PIECE. A rough, stuffed HANDMADE DOLL, made from what loo like orange Rebellion flight suit material and twine. Rey's lonely, ramshackle dwelling. Everything reclaimed. She cooks for one. Does everything for one. She opens the POWDER, moves to the makeshift WOK, where the GREEN MEAT SIZZLES. Pours the powder into milky WATER in a tin. Stir it. It GROWS INTO A LOAF as she puts the meat on an old plate. Grabs the loaf.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey sits, eats like a starving child. Every last drop. Licks the metal plate. Looks out at the horizon. A single silent ship heads off, a shimmering, thin contrail. She wipes her mouth. Picks up an old, broken REBELLION HELMET

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CONTINUED: just 'cause. Puts it on, WIDE SHOT of Rey sitting, alone and isolated, on the leg an ANCIENT, FALLEN AT-AT in which she lives. Then, a distant ELECTRONIC SQUEAL -- instantly she's up, helmet too big, she rips it off. Hears ANOTHER BEEPING SQUEAL. She hurries to her QUARTERSTAFF and runs off. Rey climbs a dune. RISE WITH HER, revealing BB-8, caught a NET but fighting back, being held by a TEEDO (a small, brutish desert tyrant), who rides a LUGGABEAST. The teedo YELLS at BB-8, who BEEPS madly, struggling to free himsel Rey watches this injustice for a beat, finally YELLING OU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tal'ama parqual! The Teedo and BB-8 STOP, GO SILENT, turn to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Parqual zatana! A half beat and the Teedo YELLS SOMETHING BACK, threateni BB-8's head swivels to him, then back to Rey, like watchi a tennis match. Rey angrily moves to them, pulling a knife from her pouch Rey starts CUTTING BB-8 out of the netting. The Teedo fre out, YELLING. Rey suddenly stands, turns to the Teedo and says, fiercely:

dialogues.speaker: NOMA.
dialogues.text: The Teedo barks a sort of "AHHHHH!" (As if to say, "GO TO HELL!"), Then heads off on his beast. This prompts BB-8 t start BEEP-YELLING at the departing bully, provocatively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shhhh. BB-8 quiets instantly. The two watch the Teedo head off. Finally, BB-8 BEEPS a question. She KNEELS to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's just Teedo. Wants you for parts. He has no respect for anyone. Your antenna's bent. (considers BB-8 for the first time,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where do you come from?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Classified. Really? Me too. Big secret. (points to horizon) Niima Outpost is that way, stay off Kelvin Ridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep away from the Sinking Fields in the north, you'll drown in the sand. (stands, heads off)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 starts after her, BEEPS. She turns sharply, he stops

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't follow me. Town is that way. (he BEEPS again) No! She heads off again. Finally he BEEPS to her -- something SWEET this time. That he is alone, scared, has no one els This makes her stop. She turns and looks at him. Not liki him. But a gesture of her head says, reluctantly, "Come on." BB-8 quickly moves to her. They head off together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the morning, you go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome. The two disappear behind a dune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three TIE fighters head to the massive ship high above Ja

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: POE, shackled to a chair, BEATEN, wakes up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I had no idea we had the best pilot in the Resistance on board. Comfortable? Through battered lips:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not really.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm impressed. No one has been able to get out of you what you did with the map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Might wanna rethink your technique. Kylo Ren says nothing, reaches out to him. Poe flinches i the chair as Kylo Ren reaches for his face, not touching him. Poe is soon in agony, remains in horrible silence --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Resistance will not be intimidated by you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where... is it? Poe can't take it -- he BEGINS TO SCREAM and we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOOSH! The cell door SLIDES UP. Kylo Ren exits, fierce, confronts GENERAL HUX (34, scary) who awaits him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's in a droid. A BB unit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well then. If it's on Jakku, we'll soon have it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I leave that to you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 is dropped to the sand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't give up. He still might show up. Whoever it is you're waiting for. Classified. I know all about waiting. BB-8 BEEPTALKS a question.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For my family. They'll be back. One day. Come on. She tries to force a smile, but can't, really. She heads off. BB-8 BEEPS... then heads after her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey stands with BB-8 in front of Unkar Plutt, at his wind He reviews her goods. He glances quickly at BB-8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: These five pieces are worth... Let me see here... One half portion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Last week they were a half portion each. She hates him. He leans forward.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the droid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll pay for him. BB-8 doesn't like this at all. Rey is awkward, but curiou

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sixty portions. CLOSE ON HER. Stunned. Literally hungry for this amount o food, her stomach practically rumbles. BB-8 sees her interest and BEEPS furiously, not liking th conversation at all. She looks at Unkar. Looks down at BB-8. Considers it all. Finally, she hears herself say:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Actually... the droid's not for sale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on. Unkar furious. Rey, then BB-8, head out. Recovering, Unka watches her go with dark eyes. He picks up a communicator

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow the girl and get that droid. He SLAMS the service window door SHUT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cell door WHOOSHES OPEN -- a STORMTROOPER enters. Poe remains shackled, worse for wear. A TROOPER GUARD here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ren wants the prisoner. TIGHT ON POE, in pain, drained, as the Guard unshackles h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An exhausted, handcuffed Poe is walked down the corridor the Stormtrooper, who holds a blaster at Poe's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turn here. Poe turns into a narrow passageway --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heading down the narrow hall the Stormtrooper stops Poe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen carefully: you do exactly as I say, I can get you out of here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If -- what--? The Stormtrooper pulls off his helmet: IT IS FN-2187.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is a rescue, I'm helping you escape. Can you fly a TIE fighter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You with the Resistance--?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no! I'm breaking you out. Can you fly a TIE fighter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can fly anything. Why, why are you helping me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because it's the right thing to do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (it hits him) You need a pilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a pilot. And Poe, seeing this is for real, smiles a hero's smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna do this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (unsure but hopeful) ... Yeah?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT ESTABLISHING the hangar. Find FN-2187, again masked, walking with Poe. By all appearances he's escorti a prisoner. A group of OFFICERS passes in the opposite direction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, stay calm, stay calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am calm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm talking to myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not yet. Okay, go. This way. FN-2187 walks quickly toward the far wall -- Poe follows up the stairs to a two-man SPECIAL FORCES TIE FIGHTER --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187 and Poe (wincing, sore) drop into the back-to-bac cockpit. FN-2187 pulls off his helmet as Poe removes his cuffs and jacket, fires up the ship with excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I always wanted to fly one of these things. Can ya shoot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Blasters, I can!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, same principal! Use the toggle on the left to switch between missiles, cannons, and mag pulse -- use the site on the right to aim, triggers to fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is very complicated FWOOOOOOM! The TIE FIGHTER LURCHES FORWARD --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can fix this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE: see the ship STRUGGLE TO RISE, CABLES connected to PULL BACK FAST to REVEAL we're inside the main control ro

dialogues.speaker: STAR DESTROYER TECHNICIAN
dialogues.text: We have an unsanctioned departure from bay two. WHIP TO a FIRST ORDER COLONEL, who responds:

dialogues.speaker: FIRST ORDER COLONEL
dialogues.text: Alert General Hux and stop that fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE Fighter LIFTS OFF from the bay, rips CHARGING cab Stormtroopers UNPACK and aim MEGABLASTERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187 opens fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187 TEARS UP PARKED TIE FIGHTERS and GUN EMPLACEMENTS WITH WELL-AIMED, STRATEGIC LASER BLASTS! Hits the CONTROL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE Fighter blasts from the ship --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe pilots -- amazed, almost enjoying it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woooahhh! This thing really moves. All right, we gotta take out as many cannons as we can or we're not gonna get very far!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm gonna get us in position, just stay sharp!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE Fighter ARCS BACK, DIVES THROUGH THE OPENING BETW THE LEVELS OF THE MASSIVE SHIP, then FLIES DOWN AND BACK, along the ship's belly --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe flies toward the CANONS --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up ahead! Up ahead! You see it? I've got us dead centered. It's a clean shot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, got it. FN-2187 gets a target, FIRES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LASERS BLAST from the TIE Fighter -- A SERIES OF CANNONS EXPLODE! Our TIE Fighter SLICES THROUGH the debris!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187 YELLS in celebration:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: YES! You see that?! DID YOU SEE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I saw it! Hey, what's your name?

dialogues.speaker: FN-2187
dialogues.text: Poe reacts, this tells him volumes about FN-2187's histor

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-whaa?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's the only name they ever gave me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well I ain't using it! FN, huh? Finn. I'm gonna call you Finn! That all right? Even in the madness, Finn can't suppress his smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Finn." Yeah, "Finn", I like that! I like that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Poe. Poe Dameron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good to meet you, Poe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good to meet you too, Finn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Hux looks over the shoulder of LIEUTENANT MITAKA, a console.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, they've taken out our turbolasers--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Use the ventral cannons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. Bringing them online --

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: General Hux. Is it the Resistance pilot? Hux turns: Kylo Ren enters fast, looms large, angry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, and he had help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From one of our own. PUSH IN ON REN as Hux says:

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL HUX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We're checking the registers now to identify which Stormtrooper it was.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... The one from the village. FN- 2187. Hux is unnerved that Ren knows -- he chalks it up to Ren' Force ability. Kylo Ren heads off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir. Ventral cannons hot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Massive WARHEAD LAUNCHERS SPIN and FIRE BLASTS toward the TIE fighter, which flies EVASIVE MANEUVERS -- most blasts hit the DEBRIS from the TURBOLASER DESTRUCTION. The TIE fighter then PULLS A BIG TURN, BACK TOWARD JAKKU, THE SANDY PLANET WHERE POE LEFT BB-8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One's coming towards you. My right, your left. Do you see it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on! I see it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice shot. Finn looks up suddenly in alarm --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're going back to Jakku. That's where.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No no no! We can't go back to Jakku! We need to get outta this system! NEAR-MISS LASER BLASTS as Poe pilots aggressively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got to get to my droid before the First Order does!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What - a droid?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's right. He's a BB unit! Orange and white: one of a kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't care what color he is! No droid can be that important!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This one is, pal.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to get as far away from the First Order as we can! We go back to Jakku, we die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That droid's got a map that leads straight to Luke Skywalker!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you gotta be kidding me!!! I-- Suddenly BAM! THEY ARE HIT!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE FIGHTER SPARKS AND SMOKES, SPIRALING out of contr toward the surface of Jakku!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Phasma and General Hux stand before a holographic projection detailing FN-2187's service records.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-2187 reported to my division, was evaluated and sent to Reconditioning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No prior signs of non-conformity?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was his first offense. A technician checks her readings, reports to General Hux.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General. They've been hit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Destroyed?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Disabled. They were headed back to Jakku -- the fighter's projected to crash in the Goazon badlands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They were going back for the droid -- send a squad to the wreckage.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON FINN'S FACE: His EYES OPEN. He goes from unconsc to terrified, fast. He sits up, looks around. CUT BACK WIDE: he sits in the middle of an EPIC DESERT, DUNES FORE A BLACK CHUTE blows in the wind behind him, scattered deb Then he sees, over distant dunes, RISING BLACK SMOKE. He gets up -- moves toward it, calling out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe! Poe! Finn scrambles over the massive dune to the TIE FIGHTER, SMOKING AND ON FIRE, small debris around it. He thinks he sees POE'S ARM -- he pulls on it, but it's JUST POE'S JAC He throws that off and tries to find a way in -- even a w to LOOK INSIDE, but the smoke and heat make it impossible

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe!!! POE! Suddenly the ship BEGINS TO SINK -- like it's being CONSU INTO QUICKSAND -- Finn is slipping in too --

dialogues.speaker: POE
dialogues.text: It becomes clear fast: if Finn doesn't get away, he's gon get sucked in too! So Finn scampers away from the TIE FIG as it SINKS INTO THE SAND! We're in the Sinking Fields. A few moments and IT'S GONE. Finn's out of breath. Horrified. Then A GIANT EXPLOSION ERUPTS FROM below, SENDING SAND AND DEBRIS EVERYWHERE! Finn sees this, disoriented, scared, exhausted and defeat And all alone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENDLESS DUNES BEHIND HIM, Finn walks, removing pieces of Stormtrooper gear, using Poe's FLIGHT JACKET for shade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exhausted, Finn continues his trek across the endless, sa nothingness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, parched and losing hope, he walks to the edge of a massive dune, looks out into the epic valley below. Miles ahead: NIIMA OUTPOST.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Hux and Kylo Ren walk the length of the bridge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Supreme Leader Snoke was explicit. Capture the droid if we can, but destroy it if we must.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How capable are your soldiers, General?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I won't have you question my methods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're obviously skilled at committing high treason. Perhaps Leader Snoke should consider using a clone army.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My men are exceptionally trained -- programmed from birth--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then they should have no problem retrieving the droid. Unharmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful, Ren. That your "personal interests" not interfere with orders from Leader Snoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I want that map. For your sake, I suggest you get it. Ren heads off. Hux hates him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sun-scorched and exhausted, Finn stumbles out of the dese into the Outpost. In a heatstroke daze he moves past enor old SHIP PARTS, MERCHANTS, SCAVENGERS and TENTED STALLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Water... water... water.. He sees a WATER TROUGH where a filthy, slobbering hippo-l creature (a HAPPABORE) DRINKS. Finn moves to it, uses his hands to desperately DRINK the filthy water. After a coup swallows he SPITS IT OUT, disgusted.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Awgh, GAH! But he's parched and immediately RETURNS FOR MORE. ACROSS THE MARKETPLACE, REY kneels with an emphatically BEEPING BB-8. Just then, TWO of UNKAR'S THUGS approach and stop her. On clearly tells her that they're taking the droid. BB-8 rea nervously as Rey resists them -- one pulls a SACK over BB while the other grabs Rey's arm -- in the tussle, Rey KNO OVER METAL URNS for sale -- Finn, still drinking, is PUSHED OVER by the happabore. He falls to the ground, then turns to look when he HEARS CRASHING. He sees, through the tents, REY FIGHTING. He moves UP CLOSER to help this young woman being accoste but he STOPS when Rey begins to FIGHT BACK -- scrappy and feral, she KICKS, BITES and HITS. Finn is taken aback as she DEFEATS the attackers, who hit the sand, hard. Finn just watches, stunned. Rey moves to the COVERED BB-8 -- PULLS THE SACK OFF OF HI Finn cannot believe his eyes. IT'S POE'S DROID! Rey talks to BB-8, who, nervous now, looks around and... SEES FINN! BB-8 STARTS BEEPING like crazy. Then something insane happens: REY LOOKS AT FINN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (To BB-8) Who? Him? Finn is confused. Rey stands, staring at Finn, defiant. Finn can feel trouble coming -- and Rey begins CHARGING A HIM, quarterstaff in hand. Realizing he's the target, Finn begins to RUN -- away fro her, through the tent marketplace. Rey goes after him -- turns a corner -- then another -- then BAM! She's got ahead of him and SLAMS HIM TO THE GROUND WITH HER STAFF! Finn is on his back, out of breath and freaked out. She holds the staff on him threateningly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's your hurry, thief?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What--?! Thief? BB-8 ROLLS UP FAST, MOVES TO FINN -- a WELDING ARM TELESC

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: OW! HEY! What?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The jacket! This droid says you stole it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've had a pretty messed up day, alright?! So I'd appreciate it you stop accusing me -- OW!!! (BB-8 has ZAPPED him

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you get it? It belongs to his master. Finn looks at her -- then the agitated droid, Finn's mind racing. He puts it all together. Frustrated, but sighs heavily, needing to respond somehow. So he makes a hard decision: to tell the truth.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It belonged to Poe Dameron. That was his name, right? Rey and BB-8 react, surprised and wanting more.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was captured... by the First Order! I helped him escape but our ship crashed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe didn't make it. (sees BB-8 is sad,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, I tried to help him. I'm sorry... BB-8 heads off to the side, depressed. Rey watches BB-8, then considers Finn again. Says, a bit impressed:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So you're with the Resistance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn's mind races again. He makes an easy decision: to li

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Obviously. Yes. I am. I'm with the Resistance, yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm with the Resistance. Rey lowers her staff, Finn stands. Rey studies him:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never met a Resistance fighter before.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, this is what we look like. Some of us. Others look different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 says he's on a secret mission, he has to get back to your base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Apparently he's carrying a map that leads to Luke Skywalker, and everyone's after it. She turns to him, concerned, curious. And asks:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke Skywalker? I thought he was a myth. Just then BB-8 BEEPS MADLY at something he sees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is it? Rey moves to him, peeks around a tent corner. Now Finn mo to see: at a distance, TWO STORMTROOPERS TALKING TO UNKAR THUGS -- who POINT THEIR WAY! Finn urgently grabs her hand and heads for the tents:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: her hand) What are you doing?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Suddenly LASER BLASTS RIP PAST THEM, HIT THE CLEANING UNI SPEWING STEAM! Rey SCREAMS -- MORE BLASTS as they run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn and Rey holding hands, the three race, ZIGZAGGING th a maze of tents:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, BB-8!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let go of me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, we gotta move!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (pulls her hand back) I know how to run without you holding my hand! BB-8 stay close! This way! Now Finn and BB-8 follow Rey -- ANOTHER BLAST just missin them! They disappear through a tent. TRACK FAST WITH STORMTROOPERS, through the tent maze. The come out of a tent, HAVING MOMENTARILY LOST THEIR TARGET.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Call in the air strike! REY, FINN AND BB-8 duck into another tent:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey, Finn and BB-8 move through RUSTY WARES and take cove Quiet, urgent:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're shooting at both of us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, they saw you with me! You're marked!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, thanks for that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the one who chased you down with a stick! Does anyone have blasters around here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you okay? Finn QUIETS HER WITH A GESTURE, HEARING SOMETHING. PUSH IN ON FINN -- whatever he hears alarms him greatly - he GRABS HER HAND AGAIN -- PULLS HER AWAY --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop taking my hand!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn pulls Rey from the tent -- BB-8 FOLLOWS -- As they race from the tent a TIE FIGHTER SCREAMS INTO VIE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT: TWO TIE FIGHTERS SCREAM OVER the town, the EXPLOSION throws sand and debris fifty feet into the air. Rey is thrown HARD to the ground -- she is rattled, truly afraid. Then she turns: FINN lies nearby, unconscious. Suddenly afraid, she scrambles to him, rolls him over. BB ROLLS OVER, BEEPING in concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! As Finn comes to, he sees her. Through his fog:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Are you okay? And that very question touches her -- having never in her life been asked it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. (extends her hand) Follow me. Grateful, Finn takes it. They're off. LOCALS run amok as TIE fighters DIVE BOMB. REY, Finn and

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey, STAFF strapped to her back, leads the way as she, Fi and BB-8 race into the spaceport. Finn glances back: TWO TIE FIGHTERS BANK their return. They YELL:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't outrun them! Rey POINTS to a parked, four-engine SHIP ahead:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We might in that quad-jumper!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need a pilot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've got one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You?! (then, indicates one

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about that ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That one's garbage! They run for the JUMPER but the passing TIE FIGHTERS FIRE IT, BLOWING IT APART IN A HUGE FLAME BALL! Rey, coming to quick stop, RIGHT UP TO CAMERA:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The garbage'll do! She turns and runs back -- Finn and BB-8 follow as they a run toward the piece of junk -- and we see it for the fir time: THE MILLENNIUM FALCON! TIE fighters BANK AROUND AGAIN. Finn, Rey and BB-8 run up the ramp of the semi-tarped Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, Rey and BB-8 enter the ship -- she hits a control a the door DESCENDS CLOSED as she races to the cockpit:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gunner position's down there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'ever fly this thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey tosses her staff aside, jumps into the pilot's seat, frantically flips switches. BB-8 rolls in behind her as t ENGINES WHINE to life:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! This ship hasn't been flown in years!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn buckles into the gunner seat -- to his shock the SEA WHIPS TO THE LEFT, startling him -- he grabs the controls steady himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great. (reacts to seat) Whoa! I can do this, I can do this--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey bucks herself up. Doesn't believe her quick words:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can do this, I can do this-- Rey pulls the yoke:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FALCON RISES, WILDLY -- ITS TARPS FLY OFF -- THE SHIP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From the tents, Unkar Plutt runs out, SCREAMS:

dialogues.speaker: HEY
dialogues.text: The Falcon BLASTS AWAY, two TIE FIGHTERS chase it, fast!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey pilots, headed for the sky! Finn SWINGS into frame, trying to work the GUNS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! Hey! Oh! Stay low! Stay low!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay low! It confuses their tracking! For a crazy instant Rey LETS GO OF THE YOKE, stretches to the co-pilot controls -- THE FALCON CANTS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8, hold on! Rey finally REACHES the switches, returns to the yoke, stabilizing the ship, afraid of this next move.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND THE FALCON as it DRAMATICALLY BANKS AT AN UPWARD A UPSIDE-DOWN, then SWOOPS PERILOUSLY LOW across the sand. Two TIE FIGHTERS SCREAM past us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the cylindrical corridor, BB-8 ROLLS TO THE CEILING! Rey looks back for a flash as the TIE Fighters pass -- Th are ROCKED BY A BLAST!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing back there? Are you ever gonna fire back?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn flicks switches -- The GUN TARGETING LIGHTS UP:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm working on it! Are the shields up? Rey strains, reaching for something in the co-pilot seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not so easy without a co-pilot! Finn struggles with the gun controls and SWEEPING CHAIR:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try sitting in this thing! Finn finally FIRES BACK at the two TIE FIGHTERS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn's shots MISS. The TIE FIGHTERS ARC BACK IN PURSUIT a SCREAM PAST US toward the Falcon! Both TIES FIRING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLACK-SUITED PILOT FIRES at the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon is ROCKED by another BLAST!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need cover, quick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey HITS SWITCHES, pilots the best she can:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're about to get some!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon speeds through a ROCK FORMATION, GRAZING THE R TAKING OUT A CHUNK -- the two TIE Fighters in pursuit, FI The Falcon BANKS SO HARD, the edge of the ship RIPS A LIN IN THE SAND as it turns, REVEALING THE SHIP GRAVEYARD AHE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 EXTENDS MAGNETIC CABLES to brace himself in a corrid

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn continues to fire at the TIE fighters, narrowly miss them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Damn it! Rey maneuvers the ship deeper into the graveyard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn SWOOPS into frame, FIRES --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on... come on... -- HITS AND SHATTERS the TIE FIGHTER!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nice shot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm getting pretty good at this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The TIE FIGHTER CRASHES amid the DEBRIS, THREE SCAVENGERS instantly there to consume the new bounty. The Falcon, pursued by the ONE REMAINING TIE FIGHTER, sla through the MASSIVE WRECKAGE, GRAZING THE OLD SHIPS as sh goes, pieces flying. The TIE FIGHTER FIRES -- HITTING THE FALCON'S LOWER TURRE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The cannon's stuck in forward position, I can't move it! You gotta lose 'em!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The ship is HIT AGAIN -- afraid, Rey's mind races as she scans the area -- and gets an idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get ready!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay! For what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey pilots the ship up AND INTO THE REAR OF A CRASHED SUP STAR DESTROYER! The final TIE FIGHTER FOLLOWS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn peers out the window, realizing where they are:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two ships slalom debris inside the giant ship -- the Falcon GRAZING ONE SIDE, THEN THE OTHER, SPITTING SPARKS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey, scared, girds herself as she quickly runs out of spa in the wreck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no! Just as the TIE PILOT GETS A LOCK, Rey YANKS THE YOKE --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon makes a HARD RIGHT TURN out of the Destroyer. Rey then CUTS POWER AND FLIPS THE SHIP SO BACK FACES FRON FINN CAN NOW SEE THE PURSUING TIE FIGHTER! He FIRES,

dialogues.speaker: DESTROYING IT
dialogues.text: REY GUNS THE ENGINES again, FLIPS THE FALCON and FLIES AW as the TIE FIGHTER CRASHES!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whooo! The Falcon ROARS OFF, victorious, leaving the ship gravey and disappearing into the clouds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon ROARS from Jakku off to space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey excitedly unbuckles her seatbelt and hurries back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey races past BB-8, who is RETRACTING his safety restrai Finn, adrenalized, climbs from the turret, meets Rey in t corridor, the LOUNGE in the b.g..

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FINN Good shooting! Thanks! I-- Now that was some I don't know! -- I've flying! How did you flown some ships but I've do that?! No one never left the planet! trained you? No one? Your last shot was dead That was amazing! on. You got him with one (beat) blast! You set me up for it! (laughs) (cocky) It was perfect! That was pretty good. They're just staring at each other now, seeing something and weird and wonderful -- two people totally inexperienc in joy and camaraderie. Bb-8 BEEPS something urgent -- she turns to the droid, kn

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're ok. He's with the Resistance. He's going to get you home. We both will.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know your name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn. What's yours.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm Rey. BB-8 looks at him: really? Finn is reminded: HE'S LIED TO HER. She looks at Finn with a sweet smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey... But before Finn can say anything they JUMP: across the lo STEAM BURSTS from under the grating.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Help me with this! Quick! They hurry to the grating, PULL IT UP together. BB-8 roll over, watches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa! What's going on? She goes below as BB-8 BEEPS concern.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Order Star Destroyer above Jakku.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lieutenant Mitaka moves to Ren, who looks out across the star field. Mitaka swallows, uneasy with his task.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir. We were unable to acquire the droid on Jakku. Ren turns to look at him, he says nothing.

dialogues.speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It escaped capture aboard a stolen Corellian YT model freighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The droid... stole a freighter?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not exactly, sir. It had help. Ren says nothing. Which says everything. Mitaka sweats.

dialogues.speaker: LIEUTENANT MITAKA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: We have no confirmation, but we believe FN-2187 may have been helped in the escape-- Ren IGNITES HIS LIGHTSABER, TURNS AND SLASHES AT THE CONS BEHIND HIM! HOLD ON Mitaka, who reacts, looks away -- win The horrible SOUNDS of Ren's rage continues. Finally Mita looks up. The metallic wall behind Ren is RIPPED with glo scars.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything else? Mitaka hates to say the following, but:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two were accompanied by a girl. Ren reaches out -- Mitaka is suddenly, violently PULLED T REN, into his black glove:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey's head POPS up from under the grating, surrounded by STEAM. An EMERGENCY ALARM BLARES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the motivator! Grab me a Harris wrench -- check in there! As he checks a storage box, she disappears down below, overwhelmed by the technical issues --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How bad is it?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we wanna live, not good! BB-8 watches as Finn searches A SELECTION OF TOOLS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're hunting for us now, we gotta get outta this system! Rey re-emerges, Finn hands her the wrench.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 said the location of the Resistance Base is "need to know" -- if I'm taking you there, I need to know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Throws a tool) This? She catches it and goes under again, leaving Finn and BB- alone. He contemplates telling her the truth. This is his moment. But instead he knees to BB-8, says quietly, urgen

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You gotta tell us where the base is.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't speak that. Alright, between us, I'm not with the Resistance, okay? (BB-8 backs up) -- I'm just trying to get away from the First Order -- but you tell us where your base is, I'll get there first -- deal?! (BB-8 COCKS his head) Droid, please. Rey pops up again:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pilex driver, hurry! Finn moves for the tool.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So where's your base?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (searching, to BB-8) Go on BB-8, tell her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please! She and Finn look to BB-8 -- who considers the whole situation, then BEEPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Ileenium system? Finn hands her the tool, surprised but thrilled -- Rey disappears below again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, the Ileenium system, that's the one -- get us there as fast as you can. A smiling Finn gives BB-8 a THUMBS UP. BB-8 quickly exten his WELDING TORCH and TURNS IT UPWARD, then retracts it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll drop you two at Ponemah Terminal. I need the bonding tape, hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (searching for tape) What about you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I gotta get back to Jakku!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (loses his mind) BACK TO JAK--?! Why does everyone always wanna go back to Jakku?! !

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, that one! No. No. The one I'm pointing to! No. NO. NO. If we don't patch it up, the propulsion tank will overflow and flood the ship with poisonous gas! Bb-8 has moved to Finn -- TIPS HIS HEAD, shows him the to He throws her the tape, she disappears below:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey. Rey. You're a pilot -- you can fly anywhere! Why go back?! You got a family? You got a boyfriend? Cute boyfriend? The STEAM and ALARM STOP as Rey pops up, annoyed:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: None of your business, THAT'S WHY! But then: ALL THE SHIP POWER GOES OUT. BB-8 is nervous.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... That can't be good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- No it can't be --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They plop into the seats, in a panic. She checks the dead

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Someone's locked onto us -- all controls are overridden. Finn quickly, awkwardly climbs up, looks out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off. Get off! See anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon, powerless, is a sitting duck. SOMETHING EPIC appears from ABOVE: THE ANTENNA ARRAY IS T

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn PLOPS into his seat, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the First Order.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do we do-- there must be

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn's mind races -- then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You said poisonous gas --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Yeah, but I fixed that --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you unfix it? Rey stares at him -- and gets his plan! They head off --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GAS MASKS hanging in the lounge are GRABBED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn and Rey, gas masks on, quickly climb into the open grating area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon BB-8. They help BB-8 down, too: they both struggle like crazy, weighs a TON.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oooh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay. BB-8 get off me...

dialogues.speaker: UNDER THE GRATING
dialogues.text: Finn pulls the grating over them as Rey works on the cont

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think this'll work on the Stormtroopers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Their masks filter out smoke, not toxins. LIGHTS COME ON! SOUND of the SHIP RAMP LOWERING! Finn PUL THE GRATING CLOSED as he says:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hurry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hurrying! Suddenly the FALCON DOOR OPENS -- AND HAN SOLO AND CHEWBA BOARD THE FALCON, weapons at the ready. PUSH IN ON THEM, ready for combat, operating silently, with hand signals o

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, we're home. Han gives Chewie a nod to check out the ship. Chewie head off one way, Han in another. The grating above LIFTS OFF -- hands in surrender, they l up at Han, who's training his blaster on them, threatenin They're SCARED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are the others? Where's the pilot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ...I'm the pilot...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You? Chewie MOAN-TALKS. Rey responds to him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, it's true: we're the only ones on board.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can understand that thing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And "that thing" can understand you too, so watch it. Come on outta there. They climb up -- BB-8 uses his magnetic arm to quickly pu himself out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you get this ship?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Niima Outpost.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakku?! That junkyard?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you! Junkyard!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Told ya we should've double-checked the Western Reaches!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who had it, Ducain?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I stole it from Unkar Plutt. He stole it from the Irving Boys, who stole it from Ducain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who stole it from me! Well, you tell him Han Solo just stole back the Millennium Falcon for good. Han walks away, takes in the ship: it's his again. Doesn' see that Rey is awed. His back to all of them, he smiles. Chewie responds as Han heads toward the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the Millennium Falcon? You're Han Solo?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to be.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo? The Rebellion General?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, the smuggler!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wasn't he a war hero?! Chewie replies: "Yeah, I guess, kinda..." Rey calls out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is the ship that made the Kessel Run in fourteen parsecs...!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han enters the cockpit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twelve! Fourteen. A moment of private joy. Then he sees something that ANNO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! Some moof-milker put a compressor on the ignition line! Han moves to the corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unkar Plutt did. I thought it was a mistake too, puts too much stress on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Stress on the hyperdrive-- (who is she? Then:) Chewie, throw 'em in a pod, we'll drop them at the nearest inhabited planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait! No -- we need your help!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This droid has to get to the Resistance base as soon as possible!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's carrying a map to Luke Skywalker. Yup: Han stops in his tracks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are the Han Solo that fought with the Rebellion. You knew him. The mention of Luke has really hit Han. He turns to Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I knew him. I knew Luke. Suddenly: a distant, METALLIC KA-CHUNK!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't tell me a Rathtar's gotten

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han hurries out -- they all follow, (Chewie, Rey, Finn, t BB-8), Finn with WILD CONCERN:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait -- a what?! Did you just say Rathtars? Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon is parked in this giant freighter's hangar. Ha moves to a CONTROL PANEL, they all follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not hauling Rathtars on this freighter, are you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hauling Rathtars. On the CONTROL PANEL: IMAGES ON SCREENS FROM ALL AROUND T SHIP. Including the EXTERIOR, where a TRANSPORT SHIP is LANDING ON THE FREIGHTER. Han is fearful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh great. It's the Guavian Death Gang -- they must've tracked us from Nantoon. Han heads off as:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's a Rathtar?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han leads our group down a LONG NARROW HALL lined with ca containers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're big and dangerous...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'ever heard of the Trillia Massacre?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. They turn a corner:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got three of 'em going to King Prana.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THREE?! How'd you get them on board?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to have a bigger crew. Chewie GROAN-TALKS, concurring.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get below deck and stay there until I say so -- don't even think about taking the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about BB-8?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He stays with me -- until I get rid of the gang, then you can have him back and be on your way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about the Rathtars... where are you keeping them? A TERRIFYING BAM: a GROTESQUE RATHTAR GIANT TONGUE SLAMS into the CARGO CONTAINER window behind Finn, whose heart stops.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you gonna do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same thing I always do: talk my way out of it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I do. Every time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A PORTAL opens. The GUAVIAN DEATH GANG enters. One man in a SUIT (BALA-TIK), and five SECURITY SOLDIERS in badass UNIFORMS with ROUND-FACE HELMETS. They turn into and stop at one end of the corridor. Han, Chewie and BB-8 forty fe away in the middle of the long hall.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo. You are a dead man. Han smiles innocently, friendly. BB-8 nervously looks bac and forth at the gang, and Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bala-Tik. What's the problem?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The problem is we loaned you fifty thousand for this job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look up, trying to get a view.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can you see them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. They start crawling down the crawl space.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I heard you also borrowed fifty thousand from Kanjiklub.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know you can't trust those little freaks! How long've we known each other? Rey and Finn arrive under the gang. They WHISPER:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have blasters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A lot of 'em. We RISE THROUGH THE FLOOR to see the GANG and Han and com in the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The question is how much longer will we know each other? Not long. We want our money back now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya think hunting Rathtars is cheap? I spent that money.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kanjiklub wants their investment back, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never made a deal with Kanjiklub!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell that to Kanjiklub. The SOUND of a PORTAL OPENING. Han's face GOES WHITE as h turns to the OTHER END OF THE CORRIDOR, where KANJIKLUB MEMBERS APPEAR. A GANG in a MEDIEVAL BANDITO style. Han smiles uncomfortably at the Kanjiklub members. Its LEADER, TASU LEECH, out front. Han tries to play it off:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tasu Leech. Good to see you. Tasu speaks an alien language, we SUBTITLE:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong again, Solo. It's over for you. Tasu COCKS HIS WEAPON, there for blood. BB-8 is nervous. Finn and Rey react to the sounds of the new gang -- start CRAWLING BACK the other way to see them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boys. You're both gonna get what I promised! Have I ever not delivered for you before?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Twice! Han realizes he's right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was the second time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your game is old. There's no one in the galaxy left for you to swindle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nowhere left for you to hide.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That BB unit... the First Order is looking for one just like it. And two fugitives. Finn and Rey SUDDENLY STOP CRAWLING, tense. BB-8 hides behind Han's leg. PUSH IN ON Han as he realize Finn and Rey are in real trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First I've heard of it. Below the grating, Finn and Rey look at each other, afrai Above, another Kanjiklubber (RAZOO QIN-FEE) says (SUBTITL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Search the freighter. One of the Kanjiklubbers begins moving down the corridor, AIMING A FLASHLIGHT DOWN BELOW, searching for: FINN AND REY, in a QUIET PANIC BELOW: THEY START CRAWLING FAST in the opposite direction they came. Rey crawls off fast, Finn follows. They quickly arrive at a JUNCTION BOX AREA, Rey looking at the controls.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait wait wait wait. If we close the blast doors in that corridor, we can trap both gangs!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Close the blast doors from here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Resetting the fuses should do it. Rey begins RESETTING the FUSES, SPARKS shooting from them they do. Finn quickly joins in. Rey and Finn FINISH resetting the fuses boxes. Rey smiles optimistically. Finn looks hopeful too. DOWN AN EMPTY ROW OF LARGE CONTAINERS, which OPEN -- and GIANT RATHTAR -- an ENORMOUS, FIERCE AND RAVENOUS LAND OC

dialogues.speaker: SLITHERS OUT OF ITS CAGE
dialogues.text: BACK UP TOP as BANKS OF LIGHTS BEGIN GOING OFF, ONE BY ON The GANGS look around. Han's eyes go wide -- he gets it -- and it's bad. QUIETLY

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I got a bad feeling about this... Suddenly all the LIGHTS COME ON AGAIN -- even down below, where Rey realizes it hasn't gone as planned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no, what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wrong fuses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kill them! And take the droid! The gangs AIM THEIR WEAPONS JUST AS A RATHTAR APPEARS BEH

dialogues.speaker: THE GUAVIAN DEATH GANG, GRABBING TWO MEMBERS
dialogues.text: SCREAM AND RUN! The gang FIRES BACK -- BLASTS FLY! Han and Chewie react, flinching -- then turn to Kanjiklub a RATHTAR APPEARS BEHIND THEM, ROARING DEAFENINGLY! The Gang turns -- others run, FIRE AT IT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, Chewie and BB-8 race down the hall -- A MEMBER OF TH KANJIKLUB GANG comes around the corner. Han PUNCHES him with one blow, throws him toward the Rathtar. They keep steppin....

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey and Finn hurriedly crawl through the space below deck

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was a mistake!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huge!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two Guavian Death Gang members run through the ship -- pa Tasu Leech, who sees another Kanjiklub member down the corridor -- who gets GRABBED BY A TENTACLE! Tasu tries to help him, but he gets PULLED UP AND AWAY! Tasu hears a distant terror-scream of a Rathtar, and runs the other wa Other Kanjiklub members YELL at him to avoid that directi they all turn a corner -- a RATHTAR IS THERE AND GRABS TH TWO OTHERS! Tasu FIRES at the beast and RUNS OFF -- and w land on a FLOOR HATCH, which opens. Rey and Finn climb ou quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They turn a corridor --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do they look like?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another corner -- and GANG MEMBERS ARE BATTLING A HORRIBL RATHTAR! Rey COVERS HER MOUTH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They look like that. Finn yanks her away. They race around another corner -- a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you sure? They scream and run off -- but Finn is GRABBED, PULLED AW

dialogues.speaker: FINN
dialogues.text: But the Rathtar's fast and TURNS A CORNER, losing Rey --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON FINN as he's being yanked down the hall, SCREAMI as he struggles to get loose! Rey turns the corner -- Finn is gone -- nowhere to be see

dialogues.speaker: FINN
dialogues.text: Without Finn, she is instantly distraught -- then she realizes: SHE'S JUST PASSED A CONTROL PANEL! Her eyes lig up as she moves to it: a BANK OF VIDEO MONITORS OF THE SH and there's Finn, being dragged by a Rathtar toward an OP BLAST DOOR. Rey's hand on the button, she waits... then

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLAST DOOR INSTANTLY CLOSES ON ONE OF THE RATHTAR'S TENTACLES! It SCREAMS IN PAIN, ITS SEVERED TENTACLE STILL WRAPPED AROUND FINN'S LEG! Finn scrambles up, desperately shaking the sticky tentacle off his leg! Rey arrives, runs to Finn, beaming to see him alive -- he adrenaline-rushed, in shock:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It had me! But the door--!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was lucky! ANOTHER CORRIDOR - Finn and Rey run towards the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, Chewie and BB-8 take cover, Han exchanging BLASTER F with GANG MEMBERS AT THE OTHER END OF THE HALL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got the door. Cover us! Chewie GROAN-AGREES. Chewie FIRES DOWN THE HALL as Han CROSSES THE CORRIDOR, BB-8 following nervously. As Chewie exchanges blaster fire, Han works the controls. THE HATCH OPENS (FALCON in the distance) -- just as CHEWI IS HIT IN THE SHOULDER BY ENEMY FIRE! He goes down with a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie! You okay? Han GRABS CHEWIE'S BOWCASTER, FIRES at the DOOR CONTROLS,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (looks at bowcaster) Wow. Come on! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Run with Finn and Rey as they turn into the hangar, towar the Falcon. Han helps WOUNDED CHEWIE up the ramp, sees th

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han! Finn and Rey race past BB-8 -- as they go up the ramp, Ha says to Rey:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You, close the door behind us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You take care of Chewie! Han and Rey race up the ramp as Finn heads up with Chewie who SCREAMS WILDLY IN PAIN!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han stands at the navicomputer, hitting switches. Rey ent fast, moves past him to Chewie's seat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unkar Plutt installed a fuel pump too -- if we don't prime that we're not going anywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I hate that guy. Han sits as, Rey hitting buttons:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you could use a co-pilot.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got one, he's back there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Rey in the seats:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch the thrust, we're goin' out of here at lightspeed --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From inside the hangar? Is that even possible?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I never ask that question until after I've done it. A RATHTAR JUMPS ONTO THE WINDSHIELD -- REY SCREAMS! Its GIANT MOUTH CHEWING AT THE GLASS! Han works the controls:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is not how I thought this day was gonna go -- angle the shields -- Hang on back there! IN THE LOUNGE, Chewie is in pain -- Finn going through a first aid kit -- the ship is HIT again --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No problem!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Three GANG MEMBERS race out here and FIRE AT THE FALCON - hitting FUEL LINES, BLASTING THE SHIP HARD! The ship is hit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on baby, don't let me down! He hits a switch -- but NOTHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! But Rey reaches over, hits a switch, matter-of-factly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Compressor. Han doesn't like it but she's right -- he hits the switch again and the HYPERDRIVE FIRES! The hangar is FILLED WITH LIGHTSPEED BLAST as the ATTACKING GANG MEMBERS ARE BLASTE BACK LIKE DRY LEAVES. In the cockpit the RATHTAR RIPS AWA as THE STARS STRETCH LIKE ELASTIC and we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Camera ROTATES as the Falcon DISAPPEARS IN A STREAK, leav the cargo ship behind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: PUSH IN on a HANGAR DOOR where Bala-Tik arrives at the wi SEETHING. Makes a CALL:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inform the First Order that Han Solo has the droid they want. And it's aboard the Millennium Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of TIE fighters roar towards a magnificent PLANET, frozen WHITE. This is the STARKILLER BASE, a natural plan that has been hacked and modified into something sinister Over this we HEAR a DEEP, almost SOOTHING VOICE. A voice very much in control, of power:

dialogues.speaker: SNOKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The droid will soon be delivered to the Resistance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: KYLO REN and General Hux in a dark space, looking UPWARD someone addressing them. We're in a massive and dark ASSEMBLY ROOM. Hundreds of DE in a stadium arc, focused on a platform where we see SUPR LEADER SNOKE. Not entirely human, at nearly twenty-five feet tall. All of him a STONY GREY. Old, wounded, fragile and powerful, all at the same time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Leading them to the last Jedi. If Skywalker returns, the new Jedi will rise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Supreme Leader, I take full responsibility for th--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General! Our strategy must now change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The weapon. It is ready. I believe the time has come to use it. We shall destroy the government that supports the Resistance, the Republic. Without their friends to protect them, the Resistance will be vulnerable, and we will stop them before they reach Skywalker. Snoke considers. Almost seems to die for a moment. Then:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go. Oversee preparations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, Supreme Leader. General Hux, proud, cocksure, exits. Kylo Ren watches him go. Snoke SITS. A new intimacy in his voice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's been an awakening. Have you felt it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's something more. The droid we seek is aboard the Millennium Falcon. In the hands of your father, Han Solo. Kylo Ren reacts with subtle, but real, surprise.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He means nothing to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Even you, master of the Knights of Ren, have never faced such a test.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: By the grace of your training, I will not be seduced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We shall see. We shall see. A gentle, satisfied nod from Snoke, and Kylo Ren, obsesse filled up, exits. Snoke watches him disappear, a grotesqu evil SMILE growing -- as he DISINTEGRATES -- Snoke has be a HOLOGRAM all along.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RACING with the Falcon through the STRINGLIGHT of lightsp

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHAOS: INTERCUT between the COCKPIT where Han and Rey pil ALARMS SOUNDING, problems everywhere, and the LOUNGE wher CHEWIE YELPS as Finn nervously works to BANDAGE HIS SHOUL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Electrical overload!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can fix that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The coolant's leaking!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Try transferring auxiliary power to the secondary tank--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Secondary tank, I got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CHEWIE HOWLS IN PAIN! Finn hangs in there, wraps a bandag on Chewie's shoulder: Chewie ROARS. BB-8 scurries off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, come on! I need help with this giant hairy thing! Stop moving! Chewie!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You hurt Chewie, you're gonna deal with me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Finn struggles to bandage the Wookiee:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
