dialogues.text: Hurt him?! He almost killed me six times! (Chewie GRABS HIM by the collar, ROARS) Which is fine.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This hyperdrive blows there's gonna be pieces of us in three different systems. Han at the controls when all the alarms STOP. Rey, satisf sits in the co-pilot seat. Han is confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd you do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I by-passed the compressor. He looks at her. A little, appreciative laugh. Han exits, walking past BB-8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move, Ball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han kneels at Chewie, who lies awake but recovering. Han checks his friend's wound with care. Chewie MOAN-TALKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nah, don't say that, you did great. Just rest. Han turns to Finn, who sits at the HOLOCHESS set, BB-8 be him. This is awkward for Han, but damn, he means it:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good job, kid. And thanks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're welcome. Finn has accidentally hit a button on the chess set, and PIECES appear, looking up at Finn, curiously. The pieces start to FIGHT as Finn fiddles with the controls, trying turn it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, fugitives, huh?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Order wants the map.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (re: Finn and BB-8) Finn is with the Resistance...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I'm just a scavenger. Han gives Finn a skeptical once-over as Finn finally mana to TURN THE CHESS SET OFF as Rey enters. Han looks to BB-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's see whatcha got.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go ahead. BB-8 rolls forward -- and suddenly PROJECTS A HOLOGRAPHIC MAP, FILLING THE ROOM. PLANETS, STARS, SYSTEMS. They all react. Chewie sits to look up. Han moves through stars, becomes reflective.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This map's not complete. It's just a piece. Ever since Luke disappeared, people have been looking for him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why'd he leave?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He was training a new generation of Jedi. One boy, an apprentice turned against him, destroyed it all. Luke felt responsible... He walked away from everything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you know what happened to him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There're a lot of rumors. Stories. The people who knew him the best think he went looking for the first Jedi temple.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Jedi were real?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I used to wonder that myself. Thought it was a bunch of mumbo-jumbo -- magical power holding together good, evil, the dark side and the light.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: 'Crazy thing is, it's true. The Force, the Jedi, all of it. It's all true.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An alarm rings on the control station, prompting Han to t some switches. BB-8 cuts off the hologram. Chewie rises and moans to Han, but Han motions for Chewie to lay back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, you rest. (To Rey and Finn) You want my help? You're getting it. Gonna see an old friend. She'll get your droid home. This is our stop. Han leaves towards the cockpit, Rey and Finn following.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BEHIND THE FALCON as it DROPS OUT OF LIGHTSPEED, revealin BEAUTIFUL GREEN PLANET ahead, TAKODANA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han pilots. Finn and BB-8 beside him, Rey as co-pilot. Han notices Rey looking out the windshield, almost in tea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I didn't know there was this much green in the whole galaxy... Han watches her -- sees a vulnerability that touches him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon CRESTS OVER an ENDLESS GREEN FOREST TO REVEAL CASTLE on a picturesque LAKE. The Falcon lands near the castle, among dozens of WORN, smallish freighters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey steps off the Falcon, UP TO CAMERA, BB-8 at her side. She takes in the towering stone CASTLE, FOREST to one sid LAKE to the other. Serene, beautiful, all new to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From BLACKNESS: a storage unit opens. Han rummages, retrieving old BLASTERS. Finn arrives behind him, concern

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, Solo -- I'm not sure what we're walking into here --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: D'you just call me "Solo"?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. Han-- Mr. Solo. You should know, I'm a big deal in the Resistance. Which puts a real target on my back. Are there any conspirators here? First Order sympathizers?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen big deal, you've got another problem. Women always figure out the truth. Hands him a BLASTER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Always. Han walks off. Finn watches him go, wracked with guilt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han hands Rey a blaster pistol as she stands at looks at castle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You might need this.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think I can handle myself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you do. That's why I'm giving it to you. Take it. Rey picks it up. Grips it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know how to use one of these?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, you pull the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There's a little bit more to it than that. You got a lot to learn. You got a name?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey. I've been thinkin' about bringing on some more crew, Rey. A second mate. Someone to help out. Someone who can keep up with Chewie and me, appreciates the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you offering me a job?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't be nice to you. It doesn't pay much.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're offering me a job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm thinking about it. Rey wants to say yes. But something stops her. A line she can't cross.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you were, I'd be flattered. But I have to get home. Han looks at her, questioningly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Jakku? Rey looks off, in thought. Yeah, Jakku.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've already been away too long.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, check out the ship as best you can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too bad. Chewie kind of likes you. Han heads off. HOLD on Rey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han walks them to the castle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, why are we here again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To get your droid on a clean ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clean?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you think it was luck that Chewie and I found the Falcon? If we can find it on our scanners, the First Order's not far behind. Want to get BB-8 to the Resistance? Maz Kanata is our best bet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can trust her, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relax, kid. She's run this watering hole for a thousand years. Maz is a bit of an acquired taste, so let me do the talking. And whatever you do, don't stare...

dialogues.speaker: REY AND FINN
dialogues.text: At what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any of it. The door opens. Music. Madness. And...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We ENTER THE LOUD, CROWDED MESS of a hall -- PUSHING PAST room full of rough and odd ALIENS AND HUMANS, who gamble, drink, scheme, negotiate, argue -- until we end up on the BACK of a tiny, thousand year-old, four foot tall ALIEN, suddenly STARTS, as if SENSING something -- the Alien TUR TO US: she is FEMALE, wearing large ADJUSTABLE GOGGLES. This is MAZ KANATA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo! Everyone turns to look. It's ALL QUIET in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Sotto) Oh boy. (Louder, waving) Hey, Maz! NOISE returns. Maz walks to them, pushes someone away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where's my boyfriend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie's working on the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like that Wookiee. I assume you need something. Desperately. Let's get to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maz walks off, gesturing for them to follow. Finn and Rey are confused. Han indicates for them to follow. They do - passing the enormous GRUMMGAR, who sits with vixen BAZINE NETAL, who watches them suspiciously. A SMALL DROID (GA-97), who turns its head to see BB-8 following Rey across the room. GA-97, now animated, makes small TRANSMITTING SOUND, which is subtitled.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alert the Resistance. Their missing droid is here! And we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: IN A DARK ALCOVE
dialogues.text: Bazine enters a shadowy space, stealthily makes a call on communicator. Clearly, BAZINE IS A SPY. Subtitled:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inform the First Order... I've found the droid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A massive Star Destroyer hovers over the hacked ice plane

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A dark space. Kylo Ren, CLOSE TO CAMERA, addresses someon OFF-CAMERA whom we do not see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forgive me. I feel it again. The pull to the light. Supreme Leader senses it. Show me again, the power of the darkness, and I will let nothing stand in our way. Show me, Grandfather, and I will finish what you started. As his emotion builds, he stands and heads off -- we FOLL HIM, PIVOTING TO REVEAL who he was talking to: THE BURNT, ASHEN, GHOSTLY DEFORMED MASK OF DARTH VADER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maz is putting together some FOOD as she says:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A map to Skywalker himself? You're right back in the mess.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maz, I need you to get this droid to Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hmm. No. You've been running away from this fight for too long. Han, nyakee nago wadda. Go home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia doesn't want to see me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, we came here for your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What fight?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The only fight: against the dark side. Through the ages, I've seen evil take many forms. The Sith. The Empire. Today, it is the First Order. Their shadow is spreading across the galaxy. We must face them. Fight them. All of us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is no fight against the First Order! Not one we can win. Look around. There's no chance we haven't been recognized already. I bet you the First Order is on their way right-- Finn stops, seeing Maz adjusting her goggles, scrutinizin him -- her eyes get HUGE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's this? What are you doing? Maz adjusts the goggles again. Her eyes get impossibly BIGGER. She grunts recognition. She hoists herself on the tabletop, knocking over food and plates, crawling towards Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, what is she doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know, but it ain't good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you live long enough you see the same eyes in different people. I'm looking at the eyes of a man who wants to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyes on Maz) You don't know a thing about me. Where I'm from. What I've seen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You don't know the First Order like I do. They'll slaughter us. We all need to run. Rey is stunned. Maz, not so much. She crawls back to her chair. She points to some pirates in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see those two? They'll trade work for transportation to the Outer Rim. There, you can disappear. Finn sees them. Considers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What about BB-8? We're not done yet. We have to get him back to your base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't. Finn stands to leave. He offers the gun back to Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep it, kid. Finn heads off. Rey gets up to follow. Maz dials her lens back to normal, and turns to Han.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's the girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who has arrived at the table with the ALIEN SMUGGLERS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was told you could get me to the Outer Rim. Rey barges into the conversation, interrupting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? Finn gets up to talk to her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Big Head) Don't leave without me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Embarrassed, Finn moves her away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't just go. I won't let you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not who you think I am.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, what are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not Resistance. I'm not a hero. I'm a Stormtrooper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Like all of them, I was taken from a family I'll never know. And raised to do one thing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But my first battle, I made a choice. I wasn't going to kill for them. So I ran.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right into you. And you looked at me like no one ever had. I was ashamed of what I was. But I'm done with the First Order. I'm never going back. Rey, come with me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take care of yourself. Please. Rey looks at him, crushed. With quiet resignation, Rey watches Finn return to the aliens... And all three head off. He gets to the front door and wal through it. Rey is heartsick, but she turns as she hears the sound of young girl in anguish, crying. She follows the sound into the castle, turning so she can't see that Finn has looked back at her one last time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey steps down into the basement corridor. BB-8 follows her. Walking carefully and confused, she is not sure why she's down here. She can hear the echoing sounds of a you girl crying. She heads down the hall... to the very end, where there is a door. It is almost as if a SOULFUL VIBRA draws her closer. She looks at the door lock -- AND THE DOOR OPENS. Hesitant, Rey enters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey moves into the dark, small, vaulted storage room. Old treasures line the floors and walls, but there is somethi specific Rey is drawn to: on a table, an old wooden BOX. She moves to it, unsure, afraid, as if an energy from ins the box has been calling her here. BB-8 nervously follows Rey reaches out, very slowly, to touch the box. A moment heavy with tension. Rey OPENS THE BOX and sees inside Luke Skywalker's origin lightsaber. With hesitation, she reaches towards it, but she cannot resist. As her hand makes contact with it, the is the piercing sound of a lightsaber igniting. She moves her hand away, as REY HEARS A MECHANICAL BREATHING sound. The CAMERA MOVES, LIGHTING CHANGES -- and we see behind h something impossible: a HALLWAY OF FROM DEEP INSIDE CLOUD CITY. Disembodied voices fill the air.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: She stands -- looks around, confused by all she sees and hears. -- Turns and sees, through a DOORWAY. We follow Rey and she runs down the corridor, but it all TILTS -- TURNS -- and she lands on the WALL -- which is now the GROUND -- dried GRASS. She turns to look -- we PIVOT -- and see a BURNING TEMPLE NIGHT. We PAN to: R2-D2 -- who watches the flames -- and a MAN appears (LUK whose face we do not see). He falls to his knees, reaches out to the droid -- with a MECHANICAL RIGHT HAND. We PUSH IN ON REY as RAIN BEGINS -- and DAY TURNS TO NIGH and she LOOKS UP -- we TILT UP -- To see we're LOOKING UP AT A WARRIOR as he is STABBED BY FIERY LIGHTSABER! He screams and falls to the ground -- w FOLLOW HIM, revealing Rey again, now in a nighttime battlefield. She gets to her feet, frightened by what she sees. We PIVOT AROUND HER to REVEAL KYLO REN, and the six other KNIGHTS OF REN, who flank him! Come back around to Rey, soaking now, as the RAIN STOPS a SUNLIGHT illuminates her -- she turns to look -- we PIVOT and see... A little girl. Rey as a child. She is sobbing, hysterical Unkar Plutt's meaty hand holds her thin arm. She is on Ja watching a starship fly into the sky, abandoning her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, come back!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quiet, girl! The ship flies towards the desert sun, which is strangely eclipsed, as if being eaten by darkness. Rey looks around her to see she is.. In a NIGHTTIME, BARREN, SNOWY WOODS. She's losing her min confounded and lost and she gets to her feet, her breath seen in the frigid air -- and then: THE SOUND OF CLASHING LIGHTSABERS! She moves through the woods, toward the soun Rey runs, heart pounding, when KYLO REN EMERGES FROM BEHI A TREE! She stops, SCREAMS, FALLS BACK and LANDS IN:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She falls back, out of the room, suddenly sitting in the hall, out of breath, alarmed and perplexed. She HEARS something and turns to look. Maz stands at the end of the corridor, realizing what has just happened.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was that? I shouldn't have gone in there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That lightsaber was Luke's. And his father's before him and now, it calls to you! Rey stands, fast. Still overwhelmed, emotional, speechles

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to get back to Jakku.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han told me. (reaches out, hold

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dear child. I see your eyes. You already know the truth. Whomever you're waiting for on Jakku, they're never coming back. But... there's someone who still could.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The belonging you seek is not behind you. It is ahead. I am no Jedi, but I know the Force. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes. Feel it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The light. It's always been there. It will guide you. The saber. Take it. Rey suddenly stands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm never touching that again. I don't want any part of this. And Rey runs off, passing Maz. Rey's mind is spinning -- she can't take it -- she turns heads off, fast. BB-8 follows her. TIGHT ON MAZ, watching her go. Maz SIGHS, feeling for the young girl.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey exits the castle, needs to run, but doesn't know wher Heads toward the woods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey moves through the foliage, heart racing. Over this, w HEAR a RUMBLING -- intense, an OMEN of something horrible come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A massive rally: a thousand STORMTROOPERS, TIE FIGHTERS, OFFICERS and VEHICLES. BRUTALIST STRUCTURES, mountainous SNOWY LANDSCAPE. Addressing them at a podium, flanked by RED FIRST ORDER BANNERS, is HUX. His voice ECHOES:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Today is the end of the Republic! The end of a regime that acquiesces to disorder! At this very moment, in a system far from here the New Republic LIES to the GALAXY while secretly supporting the treachery of the loathsome Resistance. This fierce machine which you have built, upon which we stand, will bring an end to the Senate! To their cherished fleet! All remaining systems will bow to the First Order! And will remember this... as the last day of the Republic!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ENGINEERS perform FINAL FIRING PROTOCOL. There's a sense nervousness -- WILL THIS MASSIVE WEAPON ACTUALLY WORK?

dialogues.speaker: FIRE
dialogues.text: And Hux TURNS to give the signal as we CUT BACK WIDE -- a ROAR OF BOOTS ON PAVEMENT as the thousand Stormtroopers T to face an endless snowy landscape. WHAT IS ABOUT TO HAPP

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A view PAST THE RALLY. For a moment, nothing. Then, eeril

dialogues.speaker: BOMB TEST TIMES A ZILLION
dialogues.text: THE SKY! Seconds later, a TERRIBLE EXPLOSIVE ROAR! The Troopers -- everyone -- is nearly PUSHED BACK by the FORCE of it -- the magnitude! Many have to COVER THEIR EY For MILES around the FIREBEAM, ICE AND SNOW MELTS INSTANT Runoff tunnels FLOODED with AN OCEAN OF FRESH WATER. AIRB CREATURES by the thousands burst from trees and take flig Hux watches, his eyes WILD WITH POWER AND EVIL. From HIS eyes, CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON KYLO REN as he watches the Starkiller firing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn boards the Alien Freighter. The SOUND FROM THE SKY makes him turn back. He sees the PATH OF FIRE and his blo runs cold, his heart sinks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At a massive distance we see PLANETS THE REPUBLIC CAPITAL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The galaxy CENTER OF GOVERNMENT at NIGHT. Impressive structures. Senators and dignitaries look in uncomprehend horror to the night sky. LIGHT GROWING -- FROM A GREAT DISTANCE a CIRCLE OF FIRE -- LIKE A SMALL SU

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NIGHT TO DAY! And in seconds THE FIRE BLOCKS OUT EVERYTHI

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A crowd of ALIENS files out from inside, all eyes on the FIRE IN THE SKY. Dozens of LANGUAGES exclaiming fear and horror. Find Han and Chewie moving out, looking up.

dialogues.speaker: FINN, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: It was the Republic. Han and Chewie turn as Finn arrives, moving quickly throu the crowd. With dread:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The First Order, they've done it. Where's Rey?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey races through the forest and finally comes to a stop, overwhelmed and exhausted. At an emotional breaking point she has no idea where to go, who to turn to. Then she HEA A BEEP -- turns to see BB-8, catching up with her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to go back. (he BEEPS again)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8. No, you can't -- you have to go back, you're too important. They'll help you. Then, ANOTHER SOUND -- LOUDER NOW -- they LOOK UP AGAIN: front of the system attack, A FLEET OF FIRST ORDER SHIPS ROAR OVERHEAD, TOWARD THE CASTLE! Rey's heart sinks: HER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maz leads Han, Finn and Chewie down the hall, fast:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've had this for ages...

dialogues.speaker: MAZ'S CASTLE
dialogues.text: Maz opens the box -- holds out the lightsaber to Finn:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kept it locked away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where'd you get that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A good question for another time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take it! Find your friend! Finn grabs it as the room is SHAKEN by an above ground at

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Those beasts! They're here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey and BB-8 race fast back toward the castle -- EXPLOSIO SOUNDS can be HEARD from the direction they're headed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey races through the trees -- sees Maz' castle -- BEING DESTROYED BY FIRST ORDER SHIPS! Aliens RUNNING, GETTING OBLITERATED by SCREAMING TIE FIGHTERS! Other TIE FIGHTERS and TRANSPORTERS LAND, STORMTROOPERS in attack. Just then, filtered RADIO CALLS get Rey's attention: near STORMTROOPERS have spotted her, AND FIRE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FN-417, hold position! Rey takes cover, grabs her BLASTER -- but IT WON'T FIRE! She panics, then realizes:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Safety! SHE SWITCHES OFF THE SAFETY and FIRES BACK! HITS TWO TROO and retreats, calls to BB-8: BB-8 follows Rey AWAY FROM THE CASTLE, firing back at mor chasing Troopers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren moves through the DEBRIS. A Stormtrooper approac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, the droid was spotted heading west, with a girl. Kylo Ren LOOKS BACK SHARPLY, in Rey's direction --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey and BB-8 move swiftly, terrified -- she stops them:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have to keep going, stay out of sight, I'll try to fight 'em off. (BB-8 BEEPS; bravely through her fear) I hope so, too. BB-8 BEEPS and heads off -- Rey RUNS and TAKES COVER behi a massive, mossy tree. TIGHT on her TERRIFIED FACE --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, Chewie, Finn and Maz, exhausted, CLIMB UP, peek thro debris.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Chewie! Maz turns to Finn:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey and BB-8, they need you. Now go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need a weapon. Maz grabs his wrist -- holds up his hand -- THE SABER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have one! He looks at her questioningly -- he's supposed to use the lightsaber?! He TURNS IT ON. HAN AND CHEWIE RUN, TAKE COVER from BLASTS, FIRING BACK a Stormtroopers, taking some out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, can I try that? Han borrows Chewbacca's bowcaster, fires on Stormtroopers and sends them flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like this thing. FINN SURPRISES A STORMTROOPER WITH THE LIGHTSABER, then another! Untrained, he's athletic, brave, impressive. One Stormtrooper has a MACE --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Traitor! FINN and the TROOPER WITH THE MACE battle. The Mace Troop KNOCKS FINN DOWN! The Stormtrooper is about to end him, when THE STORMTROOPER IS SHOT AND FALLS! Wide-eyed Finn sees Han run over, having fired the blast! Han helps him up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You okay, Big deal?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks! But TEN STORMTROOPERS come over a RISE, BLASTERS AIMED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't move! TK-338, we have targets in custody!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No way out, they DROP THEIR WEAPONS: TIGHT on the LIGHTSA as it HITS THE GROUND. A STORMTROOPER HAND picks it up. Han's MIND RACES as a SQUAD OF TROOPERS appears behind th Finn, Han and Chewie are MARCHED by Stormtroopers back to a transport, hands on their heads. But then -- A FAMILIAR ROAR RIPPING ACROSS THE LAKE -- Ha turns -- they all do: coming toward them across the water

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have incoming at two-eight-point- six! Move! Dispatch! Move! Scramble all squads! Repeat, scramble all squads! Anti-air cover en route to our position!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's the Resistance. One X-WING in particular -- MARKED IN BLACK -- SWOOPS DOW and takes out the parked TIE FIGHTERS and Troopers!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's Poe Dameron at the stick of his X-wing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go straight ahead and don't let these dogs scare you!

dialogues.speaker: JESS, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Copy that!

dialogues.speaker: SNAP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We're with you, Poe! The Stormtroopers around Finn, Han and Chewie SCATTER, TO in EXPLOSIONS! The LIGHTSABER LANDS AGAIN -- FINN PICKS I UP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quick! Chewie picks up his Bowcaster, Han takes the blaster. Sho a Trooper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Woohoo! YEAH! That's one helluva pilot!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the darkened woods, Rey, terrified, keeps her blaster aimed. Her eyes dart around for her pursuer. And then: THE UNIQUE SOUND OF KYLO REN'S RASPING LIGHTSAB COMING TO LIFE -- A SOUND she's HEARD BEFORE in the FORCE Rey's heart skips a beat: she's even more scared now. Kylo Ren appears from behind a tree -- Rey FIRES again an again -- Kylo Ren moves toward her, USING HIS LIGHTSABER DEFLECT EVERY BLAST. She FIRES ferociously, but Kylo Ren keeps coming! His han rises -- Rey suddenly STOPS -- GASPS -- UNABLE TO MOVE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The girl I've heard so much about. He walks AROUND HER, slowly, she won't let herself cry.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: The droid. He comes around to see her face. After a scary beat he WH HIS SABER UP TO HER EYES, ILLUMINATING HER FACE.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Request air support!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren TURNS OFF HIS SABER, reaches up... and REACHES TOWARDS REY'S FACE. She can't move, strains in agony. Aft a beat, surprised by what he finds, he removes his hand. She is relieved but still afraid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The map. You've seen it. Rey is horrified. He TOUCHES HER FACE again: the pain, te stream. Kylo Ren, taking more from her mind... She stares at him, TERRIFIED, straining in agony -- Kylo Ren, mid-interrogation, TURNS TOWARD THE SOUND OF TH EXPLOSIONS. Stormtroopers APPROACH through the woods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, Resistance fighters! We need more troops. Kylo Ren TURNS BACK TO Rey, his hand still on her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull the division out. Forget the droid. We have what we need. A GESTURE from Kylo Ren and REY LOSES CONSCIOUSNESS, FALL

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The BLACK-MARKED X-WING SWOOPS DOWN again, FIRING, EXPLOD another TIE Fighter! On the ground:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Pull back the tree line! Han and Chewie dodge debris, FIRING and TAKING OUT TROOPE FINN takes out 2 TROOPERS with the blaster, then, out of breath, turns to see: Kylo Ren in the forest, CARRYING RE IN HIS ARMS, INTO HIS SHUTTLE! Finn's heart SHATTERS -- Han stops -- turns -- sees Kylo Ren entering his shuttle. Han is ROCKED.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: Heroically, Finn runs toward the shuttle through LASER BL AND EXPLOSIONS, but the shuttle TAKES OFF -- Finn irratio

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no, no... REY!! In crazed frustration, Finn stops running, watches the receding First Order ships, Rey their captive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 moves fast, then stops and looks up as the First Ord ships RETREAT, OFF PLANET. A considered beat, and BB-8 he BACK FOR THE CASTLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Post battle. Finn runs to Han:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He took her! Did you see that? He took her. She's gone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah, I know... And he and Chewie head off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han moves toward a RESISTANCE TRANSPORT landing in the de BB-8 rolls up beside him, in wait for the transport. ON HAN'S FACE, knowing exactly what's about to happen. Finally, the transport door opens. And standing there is LEIA. She sees Han and is stunned. A silent beat, husband and wife reunited for the first time in years. In the smoke a embers, no one says a word. Then C-3PO walks out from the transport, into the field:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Goodness! Han Solo! It is I, See- Threepio! (sees Han, stops) You probably don't recognize me because of the red arm. (sees Leia,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look who it is! Did you see who? Oh. Excuse me, Prin-- uh, General. Sorry. Come along, BB-8. Quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, I must get my proper arm reinstalled. He hurries off. Finally, alone again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You changed your hair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Same jacket.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, new jacket. Chewie glad to see Leia, greets her with a hug. Chewie MO a few words, looks at Han then boards the ship. It is complicated and loving and painful. Han says, quiet

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... I saw him. Leia, I saw our son. He was here. Leia hears this. Maz watches through the smoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The FALCON and surviving X-WINGS ROAR past camera toward PLANET WITH GREEN FLORA AND A RING OF ASTEROIDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is D'QAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The SHIPS DESCENDING among grassy mounds and sunken structures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LARGE GRASS MOUNDS cover HANGARS, beneath the odd, giant trees. BOOM DOWN as RESISTANCE GROUND CREW direct an X-WI to a LANDING. In the FOREGROUND, another X-wing canopy OP a PILOT climbs out. PAN TO REVEAL the landed Millennium Falcon. Finn runs down the ramp, UP TO CAMERA, desperate, searching. Then BB-8 SPEEDS RIGHT PAST HIM, almost knocking him down Finn watches as BB-8 rolls over to the PILOT GETTING OUT THE BLACK-MARKED X-WING. The Pilot's helmet comes off.

dialogues.speaker: IT IS POE
dialogues.text: Finn can't believe what he's seeing. And Poe, kneeling in WARM REUNION with BB-8, listens and reacts to something t droid tells him. Poe looks up and sees Finn -- and he can believe it either! Poe smiles, points at Finn. From a distance, Finn gestures in sheer amazement that Poe is al

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe. Poe Dameron. They move to each other -- and embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're alive!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So are you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened to you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened? I got thrown from the crash, woke up at night -- no you, no ship, nothing-- BB-8 BEEPS -- Poe listens, turns to Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BB-8 says that you saved him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no. It wasn't just me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You completed my mission, Finn. That's my jacket?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no. Keep it. It suits you. You're a good man, Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe -- I need your help.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MOVE FAST with Finn and Poe. Finn takes in this makeshift command center, buried deep among vines and roots. They arrive at Leia, who stands with a group of Resistance Officers, including ADMIRALS ACKBAR and STATURA:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General Organa. Sorry to interrupt, this is Finn, he needs to talk to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (takes Finn's hand) And I need to talk to him. That was incredibly brave, what you did. Renouncing the First Order, saving this man's life --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (surprised she knows) Thank you, ma'am -- but a friend of mine was taken prisoner--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han told me about the girl, I'm sorry. Finn is startled -- Poe jumps in:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn's familiar with the weapon that destroyed the Hosnian system. He worked on the base.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're desperate for anything you can tell us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's where my friend was taken -- I've got to get there, fast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I will do everything I can to help, but first you must tell us all you know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca sits on a bed in the med bay. DR. KALONIA uses device to help heal his shoulder. Chewie TALKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sounds very scary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must be so brave. Chewie agrees.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C-3PO takes the DATA DEVICE from BB-8 and inserts it into BASE COMPUTER. THE PROJECTED MAP APPEARS in HOLOGRAM. Lei enters, studying it, dispirited. PAN as she moves, REVEAL HAN. C-3PO is here and some others.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General, I regret to inform you, but this map recovered from BB-8 is only partially complete. And even worse, it matches no charted system on record. We simply do not have enough information to locate Master Luke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't believe I was so foolish to think that I could just find Luke and bring him home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do what? She heads off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anything. Flummoxed, Han follows looking at C-3PO.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Princesses. Han follows Leia across the base floor:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm trying to be helpful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When did that ever help? And don't say the Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOW WITH BB-8 as he rolls over and finds, under a dark an dusty tarp in a corner, R2-D2. BB-8 BEEPS at R2, pulls of the tarp and tries to start a conversation. But R2 DOESN' RESPOND AT ALL. BB-8 tries again. Nothing. BB-8 NUDGES R2. Nothing. Then:

dialogues.speaker: C-3PO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: BB-8. You're wasting your time. BB-8 looks up at C-3PO, who stands there. C-3PO SIGHS.

dialogues.speaker: C-3PO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: It is very doubtful that R2 would have the rest of the map in his backup data.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I am afraid not. R2-D2 has been in low power mode ever since Master Luke went away. Sadly, he may never be his old self again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia hears the change in Han's voice and softens. She tur

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Listen to me, will you? I know every time you... every time you look at me, you're reminded of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think I want to forget him? I want him back! Han looks at her with sympathy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There was nothing we could've done. (hard for him to say) There was too much Vader in him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's why I wanted him to train with Luke. I just never should have sent him away. That's when I lost him. That's when I lost you both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We both had to deal with it in our own way. I went back to the only thing I was ever good at.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We both did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We lost our son, forever.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It was Snoke. Han takes this in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He seduced our son to the dark side. But we can still save him. Me. You.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If Luke couldn't reach him, how could

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Luke is a Jedi... you're his father. There's still light in him. I know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General, the reconnaissance report on the enemy base is coming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey wakes, disoriented. She is in an angled, upright restraining rig. Looks over, startled to see Kylo Ren, ma in place, standing there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where am I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're my guest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where are the others?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean the murderers, traitors and thieves you call friends? (Rey stares at him) You'll be relieved to hear that I have no idea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey studies him. She's fearful... but curious.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You still want to kill me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That happens when you're being hunted by a creature in a mask. Kylo Ren stops, considers her... then reaches up, unlatch and REMOVES HIS MASK. Rey reacts, stunned. It takes a mom before she regains her own mask of defiance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me about the droid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (a nervous beat) He's a BB unit with a selenium drive and a thermal hyperscan vindicator --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's carrying a section of a navigational chart. We have the rest, recovered from archives of the Empire. We need the last piece. And somehow, you convinced the droid to show it to you. You. A scavenger -- Rey reacts -- afraid -- how does he know?

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: You know I can take whatever I want. Trepidation flashes across Rey's eyes. Kylo Ren moves clo his hand rising toward her. She recoils, but has nowhere go. Kylo Ren nearly TOUCHES HER FACE... THEY'RE BOTH SURPRISED: they react to a feeling that pass between them -- AN ENERGY THEY RECOGNIZE IN EACH OTHER. And then it's gone. Adversaries again. Rey can't move, quietly strains in agony, trying to resist Ren's probing.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ... You're so lonely... so afraid to leave... (then, slight smile) At night, desperate to sleep... you imagine an ocean. I see it -- I see the island... Tears stream down her face as she resists. She tries to break free, but can't budge.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And Han Solo. You feel like he's the father you never had. He would've disappointed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His hand still on her face, her eyes fierce through the a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Get out of my head -- But this just makes Kylo lean closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know you've seen the map. It's in there... and now you'll give it to me. Don't be afraid. I feel it too. Where her strength comes from, she doesn't know, but:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not giving you anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll see. He peers into her eyes intensely. She meets his gaze -- DESPITE THE PAIN SHE IS STRONG. On Ren's face as HIS CONFIDENCE BEGINS TO MELT AWAY. He h slammed up against a barrier in her mind. He looks less certain by the moment as Rey seems to GROW IN STRENGTH. T FEROCITY of confrontation builds until it hits critical m

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... You... you're afraid... that you will never be as strong as... Darth Vader! KYLO REN SUDDENLY WITHDRAWS HIS HAND, as if her face were FIRE HOT. TAKES A STEP BACK, CONFUSED, RATTLED. Rey's bod is released, she breathes deeply, her powerful eyes still Kylo Ren, who starts to leave. And we PRELAP:

dialogues.speaker: SNOKE, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: This scavenger, resisted you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren, mask off, stands before Snoke.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's strong with the Force, untrained but, stronger than she knows. And while Ren's mind no doubt goes to Luke:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And the droid?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren hesitates to reveal the truth. Then:

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL HUX, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Ren believed it was no longer valuable to us. Ren turns back -- Hux enters the large space, moves to th platform beside Ren.

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL HUX, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That the girl was all we needed. As a result, the droid has most likely been returned to the hands of the enemy. They may have the map already. Snoke is visibly furious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then the Resistance must be destroyed before they get to Skywalker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have their location. We tracked their reconnaissance ship to the Ileenium system.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. Then we will crush them once and for all. Prepare the weapon. Kylo Ren is stunned by the moment -- that isn't what he m at all --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Supreme Leader. I can get the map from the girl. I just need your guidance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If what you say about this girl is true, bring her to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SLOW PUSH IN ON REY, shackled, mind still racing over wha happened between her and Kylo Ren. She is flooded with emotions, feeling her potential, her strength, that in th moment of being restrained, perhaps anything is possible. She turns to the Stormtrooper Guard. Studies him for an intense beat. Then says:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard looks at her. A beat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you say? Rey's eyes stay trained on him. She shifts in her seat, h confidence wavering, but she repeats, with authority:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. The Stormtrooper Guard, rifle aimed, MOVES FOR HER. Rey's heart pounds -- is she about to be killed, freed, o laughed at? The tension unbearable when the Guard says:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll tighten those restraints, scavenger scum!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LOW ANGLE: Kylo Ren, masked, rounds a corner, PASSES US.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey stares intently at the trooper. Calms herself. And tries again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I will remove these restraints. And leave this cell, with the door open. He reaches down and UNLATCHES THE RESTRAINTS. HE THEN TUR AND STARTS TO HEAD OUT, her back to him as he exits. SHE IN SHOCK. Then tries, quickly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And you will drop your weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'll drop my weapon. The Trooper Guard DROPS HIS WEAPON without turning back - Rey HEARS the gun fall. She's incredulous. The guard has LEFT THE CELL, ITS DOOR OPEN. REY, in ABSOLUTE DISBELIEF, MOVES QUICKLY OUT OF FRAME!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren enters the cell -- we PUSH IN ON HIM as he takes the empty cell -- AND IMMEDIATELY UNDERSTANDS WHAT HAS HAPPENED.

dialogues.speaker: NO
dialogues.text: Enraged, he RIPS OUT HIS SABER and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE ANGLE, empty corridor, toward the cell: we only HEAR the horrible SOUNDS. DESTRUCTION. YELLING. A few pieces of red hot DEBRIS BOUNCES into the corridor. Two STORMTROOPERS, crossing at the far end of the hall, S TO WATCH this display of pure FURY. They retreat, and fas

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Workers at their controls. Vast snowy landscape seen outs Their GAUGES RISE -- THE WEAPON CHARGING SLOWLY --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Begin charging the weapon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, sir. Weapon charging.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A vast view of the planet -- a MASSIVE SOLARVAC ARRAY surrounds a port TEN MILES IN DIAMETER. MILLIONS OF PANELS turn on the ARRAY -- a wave of BRILLIA REFLECTIONS. Suddenly, like a planetary-scale TESLA COIL LINE OF ENERGY, THE POWER OF THE SUN begins to TRAVEL DOW to the Starkiller Base planet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, now a member of the inner circle of the Resistance, huddled with the group around the MAP TABLE, which displa a WIREFRAME HOLOGRAM of a ROLLING VIEW OF THE SURFACE OF STARKILLER BASE. With Finn are Han, Leia, Poe, C-3PO, Statura, Ackbar, Brance, SNAP, MAJOR EMATT (60), NIEN NUN and others. An urgent, messy strategy session --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The scan data from Snap's reconnaissance flight confirms Finn's report.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They've somehow created a hyper lightspeed weapon built within the planet itself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A laser cannon?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not sure how to describe a weapon of this scale.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's another Death Star.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wish that were the case, Major. Poe hits a control. A WIREFRAME OF THE DEATH STAR APPEARS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This was the Death Star. Poe hits another control -- the Death Star SHRINKS -- AND SHRINKS AND SHRINKS, as the SURFACE AREA OF THE STARKILLE

dialogues.speaker: BASE IS DRAWN INTO A LARGER IMAGE, REVEALING THE ENTIRE B
dialogues.text: PLANET. The Death Star is a minuscule SATELLITE in comparison.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is Starkiller Base. This is news to many here, and they're stunned.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So it's big.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How is it possible to power a weapon of this size?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It uses the power of the sun. As the weapon is charged, the sun is drained until it disappears. An OFFICER runs up, hands Leia a DATACARD.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (eyes on datacard) The First Order: they're charging the weapon again, now. (then, heart sinking) Our system is the next target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh my. Without the Republic fleet, we're doomed. They all react to this horrible news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, how do we blow it up? (all eyes on him) There's always a way to do that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But no one has anything. Leia watches the silence, frustrated. Finally, rallying them:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han's right. Han is surprised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (at first hesitant) In order for that amount of power to be contained, that base would need some kind of thermal oscillator...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There is one. All eyes on Finn as he moves around the hologram to a loc on the Starkiller Base -- it is ZOOMED IN: A GIANT BLACK HEXAGONAL STRUCTURE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Precinct 47. Here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If we can destroy that oscillator, it might de-stabilize the core and cripple the weapon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Maybe the planet. Poe then tries to bolster spirits, looking at the BIG HEXAGONAL STRUCTURE: the Oscillator.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll go in there and we'll hit that oscillator with everything we got.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They have defensive shields that our ships cannot penetrate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We disable the shields.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kid, you worked there, what do you got?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (beat, then:) I can do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I like this guy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can disable the shields. But I have to be there, on the planet--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll get you there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han, how?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If I told you, you wouldn't like it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So we disable the shields, take out the oscillator and we blow up their big gun. All right. Let's go! And everyone splits.

dialogues.speaker: SERIES OF SHOTS
dialogues.text: MISSION. Pilots inspect crafts, including Snap, Nien Nunb and Poe at his black-marked X-wing. Mechanics make adjustments as Crews fuel the jets. Ground controllers mo ships into takeoff formation. Pilots prep their ships, including BB-8, who is PULLED INTO Poe's black X-wing. Finn approaches Poe wearing the jacket. Poe slaps Finn's shoulder as he heads off. Finn watches Poe, despite it all, a little laugh. Over this:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie and Finn follow Han's orders as they prepare the F for one more daring run, maybe its last:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie, check that donal capitator. Come on. Let's go. -- Finn, be careful with those - they're explosives.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you tell me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No matter how much we fought, I've always hated watching you leave. Han looks over, there's Leia.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I did it. So you'd miss me. She laughs, moves up close to him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I did miss you. He looks at her, says sweetly, out of the blue:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wasn't all bad, was it? Huh? Some of it was...good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Pretty good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some things never change.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: True. You still drive me crazy. Han places his hands on her shoulders. It could be thirty years ago. They both know there's a good chance he won't make it bac They pull each other tight, holding for dear life. Quietl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you see our son again, bring him home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, sensors triggered in hangar 718. We're searching the area.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's just beginning to test her powers. The longer it takes to find her, the more dangerous she becomes. Kylo exits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON REY'S FACE as she peers nervously around a corne Rey runs down a long, glossy hall, taking cover in an alc the Trooper Guard's rifle HELD TIGHT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon SCREAMS PAST --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flying at LIGHTSPEED, Finn, with Han and Chewie.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are we getting in?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their shields have a fractional refresh rate. Keeps anything traveling slower than lightspeed from getting through. Finn is suddenly filled with dread.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're gonna make our landing approach at lightspeed?! Chewie, thinking it's crazy too, says: HELL YES WE ARE!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alright, Chewie, get ready. Chewie GROANS: he's ready. Han studies the PANEL INDICATO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Now! Chewie and Han hit switches --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon's ENVIRONMENT SHIFTS INSTANTLY FROM LIGHTSPEED PLANET ATMOSPHERE -- it's suddenly FLYING 100 FEET ABOVE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the Falcon has no time -- it PLOWS through the trees! It then RISES --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ALARMS BLARE as the ship SLAMS THROUGH BRANCHES, SHOOTS T SKY! Han does his best to steer -- Chewie GROANS -- in th madness Han YELLS:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I get any higher, they'll see us! And the ship DIVES again, back into the trees!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A quiet CLEARING on the forest TREELINE. Suddenly the MILLENNIUM FALCON HURTLES OUT OF THE FOREST! From an erup of BRANCHES and PINE, the ship DIVES -- SLAMS INTO THE SN It DIGS THROUGH A THOUSAND YARDS OF WHITE until it finall comes to a canted stop, half buried in the snow!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sir, she was not found in hangar 718 but all troops are on alert.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put every hangar on lock-down. She's going to try to steal a ship to-- Suddenly, Kylo senses something. Something familiar.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Han Solo...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: MASSIVE WIDE SHOT of an EPIC SNOWSCAPE. Han, Finn and Che cross the terrain. WALKERS appears on the horizon. Han, Finn and Chewie take cover behind a base structure. Chewi carries a BLACK DUFFEL of EXPLOSIVES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The flooding tunnels are over that ridge. We'll get in that way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What was your job when you were based here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sanitation? Then how do you know how to disable the shields?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't. I'm just here to get Rey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: People are counting on us! The galaxy is counting on us--!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, we'll figure it out! We'll use the Force!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's not how the Force works--!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie MOANTALKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh really, you're cold?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! They follow Finn on the snowy hike. On the horizon, THE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Technicians at work, the SUN SUCKING seen in the window b him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Report.

dialogues.speaker: FIRST ORDER OFFICER
dialogues.text: Weapon charged in fifteen minutes, sir.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A STORMTROOPER waits to board a Transport Compartment. Th door WHOOSHES open -- HAN, FINN and CHEWIE are there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey! He fumbles for his blaster but Chewie shoots first. WIDE ANGLE of the corridor as the Trooper flies back, dead. Chewie drags him out of sight. Han and Finn peer around a corner, wary.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The longer we're here, less luck we're going to have. The shields?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have an idea about that. Han and Chewie follow Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Captain Phasma heads down a corridor, distant Stormtroope Suddenly Phasma is T-BONED HARD AND FAST -- SHOVED OUT OF

dialogues.speaker: FRAME BY CHEWIE
dialogues.text: And now we're in a NARROW CROSS-CORRIDOR, CHEWIE WITH HIS

dialogues.speaker: ARMS AROUND PHASMA, FORCED TO FACE FINN, WHO HOLDS HIS BL
dialogues.text: ON HIS FORMER CAPTAIN. Han stands behind Finn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not anymore. The name's Finn, and I'm in charge. I'm in charge now, Phasma. I'm in charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bring it down. Bring it down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Follow me. Finn SMILES as we CUT TO:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TIGHT ON REY'S FACE as she peers nervously around a corne Rey runs down a long, glossy hall, taking cover in an alc the Trooper Guard's rifle HELD TIGHT. From this alcove, she can see down another LONG, PERPENDI WALKWAY -- on one side, a STONE AND STEEL WALL. On the ot side, a VAST ATRIUM, with a railing-free DROP OFF, the wh pill-light design descending HUNDREDS OF FEET. At the end of this walkway is an OPEN HANGAR DOOR, reveal HUNDREDS OF TIE FIGHTERS parked outside. TIGHT on Rey's face as her plan is clear. But the problem between her and the ship she wants to steal, is a GROUP O STORMTROOPERS. Guards, in conversation. As she tries to think about what to do next, we see, FAR BEHIND HER in the perpendicular hall, ANOTHER GROUP OF ST and SNOWTROOPERS headed her way! Rey's mind races -- another peek out and she RUNS FAST, a the walkway, and CLIMBS DOWN -- her fingertips disappeari over the edge just as the Troopers approach and continue. WIDE SHOT as Rey holds on carefully as the guards walk of not seeing her over the edge, a death drop below her. But then she SEES SOMETHING and has a brainstorm. She strenuously cross-climbs to an invisible SERVICE HATCH, w She opens, and climbs INSIDE THE WALL, closing the hatch behind her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A REMARKABLE IMAGE, inside the inner workings of the base Tiny by comparison, Rey climbs amid the incredible infrastructure, a drop to infinity beneath her. She is between the LIGHT SOURCE and the WHITE PILL SHAPES, as sh makes her way ACROSS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WIDE SHOT of the Stormtrooper GUARDS, above the drop off into the atrium. What they cannot see is a SHADOWED SILHOUETTE OF REY against the ENDLESS WHITE PILL LIGHTS a she climbs across the space, beneath them, toward her exi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE AS PHASMA SITS INTO FRAME in front of a WORKSTATION Finn, Han and Chewie, blasters aimed. Phasma reluctantly works controls on the workstation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You want me to blast that bucket off your head? Lower the shields.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're making a big mistake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do it. Chewie MOAN/TALKS. Phasma hits a few more buttons -- the controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLE INITIATE". Eyes on

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo, if this works, we're not going to have a lot of time to find Rey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry kid, we won't leave here without her. The controls BEEP-CLICK. "SHIELDS DISABLED".

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Finn, cruel) You can't be so stupid as to think this will be easy. My troops will storm this block and kill you all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I disagree. What do we do with her?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is there a garbage chute? Trash compactor?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, there is...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An ALERT: OFFICERS at their consoles, OVERLAPPING, urgent

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: General, their shields are down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank the Maker!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han did it! Send them in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give Poe full authorization to attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black Leader, go to sub-lights. On your call.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At LIGHTSPEED, Poe pilots:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger, base -- red squad, blue squad, take my lead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nien Nunb pilots, acknowledges order in alien language.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another pilot, ZOLO ZIFF.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dropping out of lightspeed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With CONCUSSIVE BLASTS, the X-WINGS APPEAR and ROAR PAST CAMERA toward the Starkiller Base planet!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The CRASHED FALCON, two parked TIE FIGHTERS and a TROOP TRANSPORT VEHICLE beside it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At a distance, the X-WINGS DROP FROM THE SKY, TOWARD THE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The squad of X-wings DIVE BOMBS the Oscillator, the Black Falcon leads. INTERCUT BETWEEN THIS AND VARIOUS X-WINGS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost in range! Hit the target dead center, as many runs as we can get!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snap pilots.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Approaching target.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nien Nunb acknowledges.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: LARGE EXPLOSIONS atop the DISTANT OSCILLATOR, seen throug the large windows! ALARMS BLARE in here -- we PULL BACK a Hux moves quickly to see the damage, he turns sharply to First Order Officer:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dispatch all squadrons...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes, General.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's light it up!

dialogues.speaker: LT. BASTIAN
dialogues.text: Direct hit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But no damage! Jess reacts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, we gotta keep hitting it! Another bombing run! Remember, when that sun is gone, that weapon will be ready to fire! But as long as there's light, we got a chance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BEEPING from BB-8, riding in the back of his X-wing, an Poe looks out -- can't believe what he's seeing: DOZENS O

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Guys, we got a lot of company!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn, Han and Chewie take cover, Chewie pulling some EXPLOSIVES out of the duffel. Blast doors nearby.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll use the charges to blow that blast door. I'll go in and draw fire, but I'm gonna need cover.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You sure you're up for this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hell no -- I'll go in find and try to find Rey -- (improvising, fast) -- The troopers'll be on our tail. We have to be ready for that. There's an access tunnel that'll leads -- (Han starts pointing with his chin to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why are you doing that? Why are you doing -- this? I'm trying to come up with a plan. Finn turns -- AND SEES REY, CLIMBING OUT FROM INSIDE THE WALL, carefully climbing back up to the main level! He ca believe it! Chewie MURMURS his relief. Han is maybe more grateful than anyone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Resistance Technician turns to Leia:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Oscillator's still standing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: X-wings coming back for another round of attacks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey climbs up to the corridor, vigilant. She hears a SOUN SWOOPS her rifle at -- Finn, Han and Chewie! She cannot believe it! All Finn wants to do is hug her -- and she hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you all right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened -- did he hurt you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn. What are you doing here?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We came back for you. She is speechless -- this is all she's ever wanted anyone do. Chewie TALKS -- and Rey's eyes nearly tear up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What'd he say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (shrugs, smiles, though nearly in tears) ... That it was your idea. Finn awkwardly smiles. It's his nature. They embrace.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you get away?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can't explain it. And you wouldn't believe it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Escape now. Hug later.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X-Wings DOGFIGHT with the TIE Fighters on the surface the snowy planet. INTERCUT BETWEEN the ships SCREAMING pa each other, and the COCKPITS of the Resistance and First Order fighters. Poe's fighter NEARLY COLLIDES with a clos passing TIE Fighter!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I got one behind me. See it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, I'm on it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A heavy cannon emplacement launches a missile that shreds X-wing fighter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Furillo's been hit!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch out for ground fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The X-wings ROAR across the sky, BLASTING and DODGING the TIE Fighters and missiles. PULL BACK TO REVEAL Han, Finn, Rey and Chewie, who run ou here, into the snow, stopping, eyes on the sky, watching lop-sided battle.

dialogues.speaker: THE FOUR HEROES TURN TO EACH OTHER, RESOLVE IN THEIR EYES
dialogues.text: A long moment of communication.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're in trouble. We can't leave. (to Finn, re: Chewie) My friend here has a bag full of explosives. Let's use 'em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Resistance Technician turns to Leia:

dialogues.speaker: KAYDEL KO CONNIX
dialogues.text: General, are you seeing this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Two more X-wings down. That's half our fleet destroyed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And their weapon will be fully charged in 10 minutes! It would take a miracle to save us now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewie arrive here to find THREE SECURITY STORMTROOPERS approaching a Maintenance Hatch. Instantly, Chewie takes out the middle one with his Bowcaster. Han a the other two Stormtroopers OPEN FIRE, but Han's aim is t

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Running inside from a parked snowspeeder, Rey opens a ser hatch. Finn behind her, as she reaches into the mechanics of the place, very much like the very first shot we saw o Rey. And she YANKS a piece of TECH from the machinery and:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The HATCH OPENS! Han and Chewie, having been on the looko step inside, weapons poised. Chewie MOANS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That girl knows her stuff.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han and Chewie divide the explosives. Talk in hushed tone

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll set the charges at every other column. He GROAN/TALKS to Han, who looks around, reconsiders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right. That's a better idea. (checks his detonator) You take the top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll go down below. Detonator. We'll meet back here. They head off in opposite directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han finishes placing an explosive. Checks he's all-clear and hurries down to the next level. Chewie climbs up a le

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SQUAD of Stormtroopers SNAP to alert as Kylo Ren approa CONTROLS ARE HIT and the huge DOOR OPENS. Without hesitat Kylo walks INTO THE OSCILLATOR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A COLOSSAL CYLINDRICAL STRUCTURE. DARK CORRIDORS and CATWALKS. Kylo Ren comes to a stop. Scans the structure. SENSING SOMETHING, he motions the Stormtrooper Squad upwa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find them. They rush past him. Kylo Ren turns slowly, and HEADS DOWN

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Stormtroopers move up the ramp, weapons ready, checki carefully where blind corners intersect from the perimete They come round to the next higher level and PASS CLOSE T CAMERA. When they've passed, TILT to find CHEWIE, in the shadows of the grillwork.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once they're gone, he plants another charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Snowspeeder comes to a stop outside the structure. Fi and Rey stop for a moment, look to the sky: THE SUN IS NE GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han finishes setting a charge and is about to move on whe he HEARS SOMETHING and conceals himself behind a wide, vertical support. He peaks around the edge and his whole demeanor changes -- HAN'S POV: Kylo Ren appears and stops at the railing, loo down into the filter. Han looks at his son with a tortured storm of feelings. WE'RE WITH KYLO REN as he resumes his hunt. He heads dire toward WHERE HAN IS HIDING! Kylo Ren has an INCREASING SE OF HAN'S PRESENCE as he moves closer. He comes to where H was hiding -- but HAN IS NOWHERE TO BE SEEN. From his hiding place in a narrow, POWER CHAMBER in the w HAN WATCHES HIS SON PASS ONLY A FEW FEET IN FRONT OF HIM. Han SHIFTS HIS POSITION in the tight compartment, so he c watch Ren's progress. Kylo Ren turns onto a FLAT BRIDGE THAT BISECTS the open space. Unaware of his father, Kylo Ren walks purposefully across the opposite side. Han watches his son walk off -- the CL CLANK of Kylo Ren's boots receding. This is Han's opportunity to escape but Leia's words echo through his mind. He makes a decision and moves out, to t edge of the catwalk. He calls out, strongly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ben! The name ECHOES as Kylo Ren STOPS, far across the vast catwalk. He turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han Solo. I've been waiting for this day for a long time. Finn and Rey make their way into the space, opening a HAT that allows A BEAM OF PRECIOUS SUNLIGHT to stream down li a spotlight on Han and his son. Finn and Rey get to a rai and look down. They can SEE and HEAR Han and Kylo Ren on the catwalk below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take off that mask. You don't need it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think you'll see if I do? Han moves toward Kylo Ren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The face of my son. Kylo TAKES OFF HIS MASK. Han is JOLTED -- seeing the face of his son for the first time as a man.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your son is gone. He was weak and foolish, like his father. So I destroyed him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what Snoke wants you to believe but it's not true. My son is alive. SEVERAL LEVELS BELOW them, CHEWIE comes to the rail to wa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo flares.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. The Supreme Leader is wise. UP ABOVE, Finn, Chewie and Rey watch, rapt. Stormtroopers dot the perimeter of the structure, watching the scene. ON THE BRIDGE, Han moves closer, stern:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snoke is using you for your power. When he gets what he wants, he'll crush you -- you know it's true. Kylo hesitates. Somehow, he does know it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's too late.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No it's not. Leave here with me. Come home. We miss you. For the first time, Kylo Ren seems truly conflicted. Tear flood his stoic eyes...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm being torn apart. I want to be free of this pain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Han takes one step toward his son, but stops himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what I have to do, but I don't know if I have the strength to do it. Will you help me? Han hears his son's voice again, pained and vulnerable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes. Anything. Kylo Ren unholsters his lightsaber and SLOWLY EXTENDS IT Han, within a foot of Han's chest. Han almost can't belie it. The moment seems to last forever. And just then, the LAST BEAM OF SUNLIGHT streaming through the open hatch VANISHES. Han actually smiles -- and reaches out for the dark weapo but with the light now gone, KYLO REN'S EYES FILL WITH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. ABOVE, Finn and Rey GASP -- SCREAM --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Solo.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no. Han's last moment is looking into his son's face. HAN'S KNEES BUCKLE. The blade tilts down with him... until KYLO REN EXTINGUISHES IT AND HAN HOLDS onto the catwalk -- his life slipping away. Finally Han FALLS BACK, OFF THE CATWALK, INTO THE DEPTHS

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia, feeling it instantly -- knowing -- drops into a sea DEVASTATED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren is somehow WEAKENED by this wicked act. Himself horrified. His SHOCK is broken only when -- CHEWIE CRIES OUT IN AGONY! Chewie furiously FIRES AT KYLO REN, HITTING HIM IN THE SIDE! Kylo Ren falls back, stunne

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our MUSIC TAKES OVER, EPIC AND HEARTBREAKING as Stormtroo FIRE AT CHEWIE, who is forced to retreat down a corridor, where he holds the EXPLOSIVE REMOTE -- he PUSHES THE BUTT Hearing ONLY OUR SCORE, FIRST ONE, then TWO, then FOUR, t SIX EXPLOSIONS rock the structure -- CATWALKS FALL as the walls CAVE IN! Kylo Ren SEES REY AND FINN, WATCHING THE EXPLOSIONS IN SH then they SEE KYLO REN, WHO RECOGNIZES THEM BOTH, WITH ASTONISHMENT. He rises to his full height and heads for them with long strides. Stormtroopers begin to BLAST AWAY AT REY AND FINN! CRAZED

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Oscillator's been damaged but is still functional. COMMODORE META reacts.

dialogues.speaker: OFFICER TABALA ZO
dialogues.text: Admiral, their weapon will fire in two minutes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: From a distance the oscillator is ablaze and fractured fr the explosives. Then Rey and Finn appear, coming over a rising, running into a bare-tree snowy forest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon's this way. Finn and Rey, overcome with emotion, race through the sno forest -- until Finn SLOWS AND STOPS. Rey stops too, both out of breath. They look at each other. They both know: they can't run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren moves through the trees -- until he STOPS. Takes out the saber, ignites it. A still figure amidst the gusts of wind and snow. STANDING THIRTY FEET AWAY, FACING HIM, ARE FINN AND REY. Finn holds LUKE'S LIGHTSABER, Rey the Stormtrooper BLASTE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're not done yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're a monster!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's just us now. Han Solo can't save you. After a beat, Rey moves forward with the blaster -- AIMS Kylo Ren RAISES A HAND -- Rey struggles under his FORCE P she can't fire -- he strains too, especially with the WOU Chewie inflicted. Kylo Ren GESTURES POWERFULLY -- Rey's BLASTER FLIES OUT OF HER HAND -- another GESTURE and Rey FLIES BACK and SLAMS INTO A TREE thirty feet away! She drops -- LANDS HARD in the snow. Dazed, hurt.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey! Rey! Rey... Rey... Oh no. Oh no no no... Finn turns to her, afraid and concerned. But the SOUND OF KYLO REN'S LIGHTSABER moving makes Finn TURN BACK TO KYLO REN, lit by the glowing YELLOW AND RED BLADE.

dialogues.speaker: TRAITOR
dialogues.text: In reply, Finn TURNS ON LUKE'S LIGHTSABER -- upon seeing weapon, Kylo Ren REACTS IN SHOCK.

dialogues.speaker: KYLO REN, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That lightsaber. It belongs to me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come get it. Despite his fear, Finn raises his blade in welcome. Kylo Ren CHARGES at him - Finn terrified -- Kylo Ren LUNGES bu Finn DEFLECTS Ren's SPARK-SPITTING blade! Kylo Ren TURNS, ATTACKS, CUTS -- amazingly Finn BLOCKS, COUNTER-ATTACKS -- clearly IMPRESSES KYLO REN, who only e this challenge more! Rey RECOVERS, gets her bearings.
