Her eyes focus on the tw men fighting, through the trees. Kylo Ren is obviously hampered by his wound, yet he attac with a primal SAVAGERY -- Finn BLOCKS, turning DEFENSIVE moves into OFFENSIVE ones. And he ACTUALLY GETS A HIT IN! LUKE'S SABER GRAZING KYLO REN'S ARM! Kylo MOVES BACK -- wounded, but more enraged than weakened. Kylo Ren CHARGES AGAIN -- their WEAPONS POUND, SPARKS FLY, their blades LO the men are CLOSE, LIT BY the powerful, CRASHING sabers: And Kylo Ren PUSHES FINN BACK, attacks with pure ferocity Finn is stunned -- unprepared for this fierceness. Rey sees this -- Kylo Ren unleashes a MERCILESS SERIES OF BLOWS, pushing Finn further and further back until he los balance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's when KYLO REN STRIKES: HE LANDS A BLOW TO FINN'S T

dialogues.speaker: LUKE'S LIGHTSABER FLIES FROM FINN'S HAND, THROWN TWENTY F
dialogues.text: Kylo Ren TURNS OFF HIS LIGHTSABER and REACHES FOR LUKE'S LIGHTSABER -- BECKONING IT WITH THE FORCE. LUKE'S LIGHTSABER VIBRATES IN THE SNOW. Kylo Ren GESTURES, INCREASES HIS POWER -- LUKE'S LIGHTSAB

dialogues.speaker: SHOCKED
dialogues.text: Holding it with both hands, SHE IGNITES LUKE'S LIGHTSABER FOR THE FIRST TIME, HER EYES BLAZING. Kylo Ren IGNITES HIS SABER. It's REY who charges now -- Kylo Ren immediately on the defensive. They BATTLE POWERFULLY -- He is clearly rocked by her raw, innate skill.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We just lost R-1!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're overwhelmed! What do we do? It isn't working! Another pilot looks down -- SEES THE EXPLOSION -- coming from the OSCILLATOR. Relatively small, it's an opening:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black Leader, there's a brand new hole in that oscillator. Looks like our friends got in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Red Four! Red Six! Cover us!

dialogues.speaker: LT. BASTIAN
dialogues.text: I'm on it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Roger!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody else, hit the target hard! Give it everything you got! And the X-WINGS DIVE and BLAST the OSCILLATOR --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another two X-wings -- including Poe's -- soar through th trench leading to the oscillator structure!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I need some help here! I need some help!

dialogues.speaker: LT. BASTIAN
dialogues.text: I'm coming in!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm hit! The alien pilot's X-wing is blasted to pieces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All teams - I'm going in! Pull up and cover me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Copy that, Black Leader! Good luck, Poe! The trailing X-wings peel off as Poe's black fighter dart into the fiery breach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Outside, the SUN ALMOST COMPLETELY GONE -- PULL BACK THRO

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Weapon at full capacity in thirty seconds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Prepare to fire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Poe's X-wing weaves through the breach. A pursuing TIE fighter does not clear the gap, leaving Poe to circle the interior of the unguarded structure, firing volley after volley of torpedoes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The remaining X-Wings -- including Poe's -- BLAST the pla and the structure begins to CRATER, deep underground

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amid the BARE WHITE TREES, ONLY TWO LIGHTSABERS -- LUKE'S BLUE AND REN'S YELLOW-RED -- ILLUMINATE the FLURRIES OF S as Rey and Kylo Ren BATTLE HARD. She seems to be, impossibly, STRONGER THAN HE IS for half dozen blows -- until he FINDS HIS STRENGTH and FIGHTS BAC MOVING FORWARD and PUSHING REY BACK, into the forest. Suddenly a COLOSSAL CHUNK OF THE FOREST RIGHT BEHIND REY DROPS AWAY! Rey is suddenly fighting on the EDGE OF A

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You need a teacher! I can show you the ways of the Force!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Force. Rey closes her eyes for a long beat. When Rey opens them, she is centered, fortified, and she POUNDS BACK, SINGLE H SWIPES, hitting Ren's gnarly, spitting saber with incredi FORCE. It's so fast now, so furious, that Kylo Ren FALLS BACK -- She ATTACKS HARDER! Ren gets up again but she HITS HIS SABER'S HILT -- HIS BL GOES FLYING OFF, TUMBLING INTO THE SNOW -- and she SLASHE

dialogues.speaker: CHEST. HE GOES DOWN, SUDDENLY A FEARFUL MAN, A LARGE BURN
dialogues.text: SCAR SLASHED ACROSS HIS FACE! He still reaches for his sa And she could kill him -- right now, with ONE VICIOUS STR But she stops. Realizing she stands on a greater edge tha even the cliff -- the edge of the dark side. The earth SHAKES. The earth splits. A gully forms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The area where the RALLY was held is now COLLAPSING into giant sink hole! We WHIP PAN to a YOUNG TECHNICIAN, who watches this out the control room window in horror. He hurries off, passing COLONEL DATOO, who admonishes:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Lieutenant, get back to your station!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (stops, fleetingly) Just look. We won't survive -- even Hux has gone! As he hurries off, WE HEAR:

dialogues.speaker: GENERAL HUX, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Supreme Leader.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hux stands before SNOKE'S IMAGE. Relative quiet here, but distant SOUNDS OF DESTRUCTION. Hux tries to keep it toget but is horrified, heartsick:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The fuel cells have ruptured. The collapse of the planet has begun. Snoke takes this in. Furious, desolate... knowing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leave the base at once and come to me with Kylo Ren.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It is time to complete his training.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey turns, runs a hundred feet through the forest to: FINN, who lies, near death, not far from where the GROUND FELL AWAY. Rey falls to her knees near him, turns him ove sees his cauterized but possibly fatal wound.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Finn! Finn... Tears come to her eyes as she lifts him, holds his lifele body in her arms. Snow flurries around them as she cries, holding this boy who she just met, who she already adores They are left here to die -- nearby MORE TREES DROP as th planet continues to COLLAPSE. And just as it seems like a is lost... Her wet eyes look up to see:

dialogues.speaker: LIGHTS RISE FROM THE NEWLY-FORMED CANYON
dialogues.text: KNOW -- IT'S THE MILLENNIUM FALCON -- and its lights

dialogues.speaker: ILLUMINATE REY, WHOSE FACE FILLS WITH HOPE
dialogues.text: CHEWIE IS AT THE CONTROLS. He ROARS to them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie exits the ship. MOMENTS LATER Chewie CARRIES FINN up the ramp. Rey hurrie with them back into the ship --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie carries Finn inside, followed by Rey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And we FLY WITH THE FALCON as it leaves the planet -- we see CHEWIE AND REY PILOTING, the COLLAPSING PLANET BEHIND US. The Resistance X-wings, led by Poe, follow the Falcon

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All teams! I got eyes on them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes! The X-wings ROAR OFF, skyward as the MUSIC SOARS, the PLA IMPLODES -- THE SUNLIGHT IT CONTAINS BURSTS FORTH, and as get further and further distance from what was Starkiller Base, we witness the REBIRTH OF A SUN. Light restored to corner of the galaxy. The Millennium Falcon and the X-wings RIP THROUGH SPACE, headed home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our job's done here. Let's go home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ESTABLISHING SHOT as the Falcon on the landing strip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon has landed among the remaining Resistance ship Poe is there, watching as Chewie scuttles down the ramp carrying an unconscious Finn. Medical Personnel and Offic meet them, usher them inside.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, easy. He's hurt. We've got a heartbeat. Rey walks down the ramp and sees, for the first time, Lei C-3PO and BB-8 behind her. The crowds are cheering. Rey is so sad for Leia, so sorry. The two women move for each other. And Leia takes Rey's face in her hands. Despite her heartbreak, she is gratefu She embraces Rey. A mother's embrace. Rey cries, too, in this emotional first meeting.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewbacca sits quietly, as do many in the base, mourning their losses. As BB-8 approaches R2-D2, the long dormant droid suddenly stirs. The droids beep at each other.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: R2-D2! You've come back! You found what? How dare you call me that!

dialogues.speaker: C-3PO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (he swats R2-D2, who

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find Master Luke how? Come, R2! We must go tell the others at once!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Leia stands alone and in silence, heartbroken.

dialogues.speaker: C-3PO, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: General? Excuse me, General? Leia turns to see droids.

dialogues.speaker: C-3PO, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: R2-D2 may contain some much needed good news.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tell me. Rey stands with Leia, Poe C-3PO, BB-8 and a handful of Resistance Officers. Suddenly R2-D2 PROJECTS A HOLOGRAM!

dialogues.speaker: LARGE NAVIGATIONAL MAP WITH A SPECIFIC MISSING CHUNK
dialogues.text: BB-8 BEEPS -- Poe turns to him --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, all right, buddy, hold on -- Poe runs over -- removes the ancient data device that Lor San Tekka had given him from a base computer. He inserts back inside BB-8, who then PROJECTS HIS MAP -- which he SHRINKS DOWN TO SIZE -- and the two droids MOVE SLIGHTLY

dialogues.speaker: R2-D2'S PERFECTLY
dialogues.text: Everyone REACTS -- amazed --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh! The map! It is complete!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (hand on her heart) -- Luke -- Suddenly there are CHEERS AND EMBRACES. C-3PO leans down to R2-D2 and says, quietly, sweetly:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to R2-D2) Oh my dear friend. How I've missed you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A NEW DAY. Finn, unconscious in an I.C.U. POD. His fate uncertain. Rey sits with him. Deeply worried. Finally she leans in, close to him. She kisses him and says, quietly, despite her fear:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We'll see each other again. I believe that. Thank you, my friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Chewie does last minute checks of the Falcon. Rey stands with Leia a beat and then turns to head to the Falcon. As Rey walks off, she hears Leia call out:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey. Rey turns around.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May the Force be with you. This fills Rey up. She smiles gratefully. Rey crosses to the Falcon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey sits in the pilot seat, Chewie as co-pilot. Rey looks at him compassionately. Rey FLICKS SWITCHES and --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Millennium Falcon RISES. Leia, with Poe, BB-8, and C-3PO (with his proper arm replaced), watches the next generation of Jedi begin her journey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Falcon FLIES through space and BLASTS to LIGHTSPEED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pristine and mighty OCEAN. Endless BLUE, dotted with random, beautiful, mountainous BLACK ROCK ISLANDS, dotted with countless GREEN TREES. The Millennium Falcon FLIES INTO VIEW, BANKS toward one o the ISLANDS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey, her staff strapped to her back, begins her hike up t considerable mountain, glancing back at Chewie and R2-D2, who watch her from the bottom of the ramp. A deep breath and Rey continues her journey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Built within the rock and foliage of this idyllic island seemingly endless ANCIENT STONE STEPS. Rey continues to climb them, determined, despite her fatigue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Rey arrives at a clearing. Small, modest, primitive stone structures. But no one around. Rey walks past them, sees, senses no one. And then she stops. Feels something. She turns. Standing forty feet away from her, his back to us, is a M in a CLOAK AND ROBE. Rey stares, knowing exactly who it is. But she just stare for what seems like forever. Until he finally TURNS, SLOW to her. Pulls back his hood. IT IS LUKE SKYWALKER. Older now, white hair, bearded. He looks at Rey. A kindne in his eyes, but there's something tortured, too. He does need to ask her who she is, or what she is doing here. Hi look says it all. In response, Rey pulls something from the pack. LUKE'S LIGHTSABER. And she holds it out to him. An offer. A plea. The galaxy only hope. HOLD ON LUKE SKYWALKER'S INCREDIBLE FACE, amazed and conflicted at what he sees, as our MUSIC BUILDS, the prom of an adventure, just beginning...
